instruction: Netherlands ke bare mein bataye:
output:
Netherlands ya Walandez ((Walandezi: Nederland)‏), ghair rasmi tor par Holland, aik bain albaraazmi mulk hai jo Caribbean mein samandar paar ilaqon ke sath shumal maghribi Europe mein waqeh hai. Yeh Netherlands ki badshahi ke chaar juzwi mumalik mein sab se bara hai (baqi Aruba, Curaçao aur Sint Maarten hain). Europe mein, Netherlands barah soobon par mushtamil hai aur is ki sarhaden mashriq mein Germany, janoob mein Belgium, shumal aur maghrib mein shumali samandari sahili pati ke sath milti hain. Is ki samandari sarhaden dono mumalik ke sath aur shumali samandar mein Britain ke sath bhi milti hain.

Is ka dar ul hukumat shehar Amsterdam hai.

instruction: Kya coffee peena sehat ke liye nuqsan deh hai?
output:
Aksar log subah ke auqat mein chai ke muqablay mein coffee peena pasand karte hain, lekin kuch log coffee ka istemal had se zyada karte hain magar woh is ke manfi aur musbat asraat se la-ilm hotay hain.

Coffee energy booster hai kyun ke log kaam ke dauran izafi cup bhi lete hain aur mutadid tehqiq mein yeh baat samne aayi hai ke is ke fawaid mein cancer ke khatre mein kami ke sath dil ki bimaariyon aur type 2 diabetes se bachao bhi shamil hai.

Tehqiq se yeh baat bhi samne aayi hai ke agar is ka zyada istemal kiya jaye to is ke nateeje mein dil ki bimaari, falij aur dementia ka khatra barh sakta hai.

Report ke mutabiq jis mein American Society for Nutrition ki aik rukun Tricia Pessota ke hawale se bataya gaya hai ke coffee ka mamool ka istemal sehat ke liye bura nahi hai lekin ise sehat ke fawaid ke liye nahi piya jana chahiye.

instruction: Pakistaniyon ne aik saal ke dauran kitne karor dollar ki chai pi?
output:
Idara Shumariyat ke mutabiq rawan saal Pakistani 184 million dollar se zayed ki chai pi gaye hain. Idara Shumariyat aur State Bank of Pakistan ki janib se jari honay wali report ke mutabiq rawan maali saal ki pehli sah maahi mein chai ki daraamadat par 184.061 million dollar ka zar-e-mubadla sarf hua jo guzashta maali saal ki isi muddat ke muqablay mein 32.30 faizad zyada hai. Guzashta maali saal ki isi muddat mein chai ki daraamadat par 139.11 million dollar ka zar-e-mubadla sarf hua tha. September mein chai ki daraamadat ka hajm 58.11 million dollar record kiya gaya jo August mein 59.27 million dollar aur guzashta saal September mein 55.96 million dollar tha.

Wazeh rahe ke pehli sah maahi mein ashya-e-khoraak ki majmooi daraamadat ka hajm 1.696 arab dollar record kiya gaya hai jo guzashta maali saal ki isi muddat mein 2.290 arab dollar tha.

instruction: Mangochiyan bananay ki tarkeeb batain
output: Daal ko dho kar bhigo kar rakhain aur jab woh achi tarah phool jaye to is ka pani chhaan lain aur isay bareek pees lain. Phir is mein cooking oil, namak, laal mirchain, bareek kata hua hara dhania aur hari mirchain daal kar milain aur choti choti goliyan bana lain. Ubltay huay pani par chhalni rakh kar is par in mangochiyon ko rakh kar dhak dain aur pandrah se bees minute bhaap par paka lain. Gravy tayar karne ke liye chaar khanay ke chamach cooking oil mein do kachi pisi hui pyaaz aur aik chai ka chamach adrak lehsan daal kar sunahri honay tak fry karain. Phir is mein aik chai ka chamach pisi hui laal mirch, pisa dhania aik chai ka chamach aur aadha chai ka chamach haldi daal kar bhonain aur aadhi piyali pani daal kar itni der pakain ke pani khushk ho jaye. Tayyar ki hui mangochiyan daal kar milain aur aik piyali pani daal kar aadha chai ka chamach pisa hua garam masala daal kar halki aanch par gravy gaadhi honay

instruction: Islam shuru mein junubi Asia mein kaise phaila?
output: Junubi Asia mein Islam ke phelao ka pata 7 wein sadi ke awael se lagaya ja sakta hai jab jazeera numa Arab aur Fars ke tajiron aur tajiron ne Bar-e-Sagheer Pak o Hind ke sath tijarati rawabit qaim karna shuru kiye the. Is ta'awun ne junubi Asia ke logon ko Islami aqeede se mutaarif karaya. Halaanke, khitte mein Islam ki numayan tosee 8 wein sadi mein Arbon ki fatahat se shuru hui, khas taur par Umayyad Khilafat ke douran. In fatahat ke nateejay mein Sindh ka ilaqa (ab Pakistan ka hissa) Islami Khilafat mein shamil ho gaya. Waqt ke sath sath Islami hukoomat Bar-e-Sagheer Pak o Hind ke mukhtalif hisson mein phail gayi. In ibtidaai muhimat ki kamyabi fouji taqat aur Islami paighaam ki appeal dono ki wajah se thi.

instruction: Apne refrigerator ki safai karte waqt, cross aaloodegi ko rokne ke liye aik ahem qadam kya hai?
output:
Refrigerator ki safai karte waqt cross aaloodegi ko rokna bohat zaroori hai. Fridge se tamam ashya ko nikaal kar shuru karein, miyaad khatam ya kharab shuda khanay ko chhor dein. Halke sabun aur garam pani ke mixture se refrigerator ke andar ko saaf karein. Cross aaloodegi ko rokne ke liye, zyada khatra walay ilaqay jaise shelf, daraz aur darwazay ki mehron par khusoosi tawajjo dein. Safai ke baad, khanay ke liye mehfooz jarasim kash ke sath satahon ko jarasim se paak karein. Mumkin aaloodegi se bachne ke liye chilkon ko fori tor par saaf karna aur khaam gosht ko leak-proof containers mein zakheera karna zaroori hai.
Safai ke baad fridge ko aik ya do ghante ke liye chhor dein taake gas leak na ho.

instruction: Explain the process of a given cooking technique.
input: Poaching
output: Poaching is a cooking technique in which food is submerged in a liquid, such as water, stock, or wine, and heated to a gentle simmer. It is an effective way to cook delicate foods like fish and eggs, as it does not require excessive heat or oil. Generally, the food is added to the liquid, heated to a gentle simmer, and left to cook until the desired temperature is reached.

instruction: Adakara Shilpa Shetty ke saath nasli imtiaz ke ilzamat ke baad aik niji phone company, Carphone Warehouse ne is program 'Big Brother' se taawun karne se inkar kar diya hai.
output:
Channel Four par adakara Shilpa Shetty ke saath nasli imtiaz ke ilzamat ke baad, aik niji phone company, Carphone Warehouse, ne is program "Big Brother" se taawun karne se tanak ruk janay ka elaan kiya hai. In ilzamat ke bawajood, Shilpa ne aakhri tahdeedi cricketer persons ko "nasal parasti ka shikar nahi hui" kaha hai.

Aisay moqaon par, yeh ahem hota hai ke social media par shakhsiyat ki intiqad aur dhamkiyon ke bawajood, un ke asraat ka ta'aqqul se jaiza liya jaye. Taawun kuninda company ki taraf se Carphone Warehouse ka inkar aik nai tawazuni riwayat ki taraf ishara karta hai jo aik musbat aur barah-e-raast pesha warana muaina ka hissa ban sakta hai.

Yeh umoor nihayat sanjeedgi se dekhne chahiyein kahin bhi aapsi taawun aur kamki tarweej mein nak

instruction: Generate a unique vacation idea.
input: Loc: Anywhere
output: Why not go on a glamping trip? This type of vacation is a blend between traditional camping and luxury lodging, as you can stay in a tent, cabin, yurt, or camper, but still have access to amenities like indoor bathrooms and modern kitchen facilities. Plus, glamping locations are often found in some of the world's most beautiful outdoor settings, so you can explore nature and take in breathtaking views.

instruction: Gohar nayab Abdul Sattar Edhi. Is ke baare mein humein mazeed batain
output: Jab pathar ko behtareen andaaz mein tarasha jaye to woh gohar nayab banta hai, aur jab kisi bachay ki aala paaye ki tarbiyat ki jaye to woh dukhi insaniyat ka maseeha banta hai. Khidmat insaniyat ki roshan misaal, Abdul Sattar Edhi bhi azeem maan se aala tarbiyat le kar amali zindagi mein daakhil hue, ke un ki walida Abdul Sattar Edhi ko rozana aik paisa khana khanay ke liye deteen aur aik paisa kisi doosray shakhs ki madad ke liye. Yehi wajah hai ke Abdul Sattar Edhi ne saari zindagi rangeeniyon se kinara kash ho kar khud ko khidmat insaniyat ke azeem mission ki takmeel ke liye waqf kiye rakha. Edhi ne rasmi taleem to high school tak bhi haasil nahi ki thi taham woh kehte thay ke duniya ke gham mere ustaad aur danayi o hikmat ka zariya rahe hain. 1951 mein unhon ne zaati dukan mein aik doctor ki madad se mukhtasar shafakhana khola. Un ke aik dost

instruction: Urdu mein kahani sunaiye:
output:
Unwan: burhiya ka haar
Dopehar ka waqt tha. Barish ke sabab khunki khunki hawa chal rahi thi. Ammi ne Salman ko bazar se sabzi lene ka kaha to woh koodta hua apni cycle par bazar ki taraf rawana ho gaya. Salman waliden ka farmanbardar aur bohat moazzab beta tha. Ammi ya Abu ke munh se nikle har hukum ko man o an poora karta tha. Bazar jate hue raste mein Salman cycle chalate chalate thak gaya to kuch der sustane ke liye woh cycle khari kar ke aik darakht ke neeche bench par baith gaya.
Achanak us ki nazar us purane purse par pari jo qadre behtar haalat mein para tha. Salman sochne laga ke yeh purse utha leta hoon ghar ja kar choti behan Maryam ko doon ga. Woh kai baar Ammi se purse lene ka keh chuki thi. Salman ne purse ko uthaya phoonk maari aur gard o ghubar saaf karte hue jab purse khola to haka baka reh gaya.
Is purse mein sonay ka haar aur bohat sari jewellery mojood thi. Woh bohat khush ho gaya magar us ke zehan mein zimmedari ka ehsas paida hua aur kuch der sochne

instruction: Write the lyrics of a rap song about climate change.
output:
[Verse 1]
Yo, it's getting hot up in here
The climate's changing like it's never been before
Gotta take action, can't just sit and ignore
No time to waste, so get up off the floor

[Chorus]
It's time to make a change, can't keep living in this mess
Gotta do something, it's time to address
Global warming and pollution put us in this situation
So we better start caring, got no more time to wait

[Verse 2]
Pollution's spreading rampant, don't think we can survive
The Earth's in trouble, we must take it alive
It's our only home, don't just let it die
Fight for the future, and to our planet, we must be a guide

[Chorus]
It's time to make a change, can't keep living in this mess
Gotta do something, it's time to address
Global warming and pollution put us in this situation
So we better start caring, got no more time to wait

[Outro]
Global warming's real, and it's time to take a stand
Gonna fight for the future, protect this land
Green energy's the answer, to save the day
Power the world with clean energy, it's the only way!

instruction: Describe the lifetime of a star.
output: A star is born from a nebula - a gigantic cloud of dust and gas. It collapses under its own gravity and begins to spin, forming a dense core called a protostar. It takes millions of years for the core to heat up enough to begin nuclear fusion, and the star lights up - this is the main sequence of its lifetime. As the nuclear fuel in the core starts running out, the star expands and cools, forming a red giant. Depending on its mass, it may then collapse into a dense white dwarf, or explode into a supernova.

instruction: Aap ko kya lagta hai ke Instagram nai nasal ko barbaad kar raha hai?
output: Majmooi tehqeeq se aisa lagta hai ke Instagram nai nasal ka mustaqbil tabah kar raha hai. Ab tak bachay aur nojawan tabqa PUBG aur doosre mobile games ki wajah se apni zindagiyan tabah kar rahe thay, in digital khailon ki wajah se bachon par zehni asar parrha tha, kai bachay zehni tawazun kho chuke hain to kai bachon aur nojawanon ko apni jaan se haath dhona para hai. Is tarah ke khailon ko dekhte hue Bharat sarkar ne in khailon par pabandi laga chuki hai aur kai bachon ki sahi rehnumai aur counseling hone ke baad yeh bachay in jaan lewa khailon se door ho chuke hain, lekin pichlay kuch dino se social ki aik nai waba bachon ki zindagiyon ko tabah kar rahi hai, khususan bachay ikhlaqi girawat ka shikar ho rahe hain aur kam umar mein hi najaiz rishte, jinsi hirasani aur pyar o mohabbat ke jhootay jaal mein phansay ja rahe hain. Khaas tor par social media par maqbool tareen application Instagram ki wajah se

instruction: G 20 ahem maeeshatein ke bare mein kuch batao
output:
Bees ka group (Group of Twenty) (jise G 20 bhi kaha jata hai) 20 ahem maeeshaton ki hukoomaton aur markazi bank ke governoron ka aik bain ul aqwami forum hai. Is ke arakeen mein 20 infiradi mumalik Argentina, Australia, Brazil, Canada, Cheen, France, Germany, Bharat, Indonesia, Italy, Japan, Junubi Korea, Mexico, Russia, Hispania, Saudi Arab, Junubi Africa, Turkey, Mamlakat Muttahida, Riyasat-haye-Muttahida America aur European Union shamil hain. European Union ke deegar rukan mumalik infiradi tor par is ke rukan nahi hain.

Mayari Cheeni: 二十国集团，20国集团; Èrshí guó jítuán, 20 gu

instruction: Generate a list of 5 things a student should keep in mind when studying for an exam.
output:
1. Start studying early and pace yourself so you don't feel overwhelmed.
2. Break down the material into manageable chunks and focus on understanding it thoroughly.
3. Take regular breaks to allow your mind to rest and recharge.
4. Create a study plan so you can make the most of your time and stay on track.
5. Make sure to practice plenty of exercises to test your knowledge.

instruction: Create a list of three benefits of cloud computing.
output:
1. Cost savings, as most cloud computing services are billed on a pay-as-you-go model based on usage rather than a fixed fee.
2. Scalability, as the cloud can be easily scaled up or down based on changing needs.
3. Increased security, as data is stored in a secure environment, protected by several layers of security protocols.

instruction: Explain how plants respond to the environment.
output: Plants are able to sense and respond to environmental signals, such as light, temperature, and moisture, in order to survive and thrive. Plants use photoreceptors to detect light, specialized cells to sense and respond to changes in temperature, and their root systems to detect moisture. Plants also respond to biotic stimuli, such as the presence of other organisms or predators. In response, plants may produce defensive chemicals or adopt defensive behaviors to protect themselves.

instruction: Qadeem Misr mein bandron ki mummiyon ka kya raaz hai?
output:
Aik nai tehqiq ne is dareena raaz se parda uthaa diya hai ke primates (bandar numa mamaliya janwaron ki aik qisam) apni qudrati rehaish gah se itni door kaise mojood the. Is tehqiq ke mutabiq qadeem Misr mein paye janay walay baboon mumkinah tor par door daraz ilaqon se laye kiye gaye the aur unhein qaid mein rakha gaya tha.

Is se qabl Misr mein paye janay walay baboonon ke asaar ne muhaqiqeen ko heran kar diya tha kyun ke yeh bandar Misr ka muqami janwar nahi hai. Is baat ka bhi koi saboot nahi hai ke yeh janwar maazi mein is ilaqay mein abad tha.

Aksar yeh qiyas lagaya jata hai ke momiyayay gaye baboonon ko mumkinah tor par logon ki taraf se nazrana dene ke liye istemal kiya jata tha. Is primate janwar ko qadeem Misr mein janwaron ke tor par pesh kiye gaye mukhtalif dewtaon mein dewta Thoth ke numainda kirdar tak pohancha diya gaya tha jo seekhnay

instruction: Describe the problems of human trafficking in the given paragraph.
input: Human trafficking is a pervasive problem all over the world, affecting millions of people who are forced into unpaid labor, sexual slavery, and other forms of exploitation. It is driven by poverty and conflict, and often involves women and children as targets.
output: Human trafficking is a serious issue affecting millions of people across the globe. It involves forcing individuals into unpaid labor, sexual servitude, and other forms of exploitation due to poverty and conflict, with women and children as common targets.

instruction: What are some simple tips for backup and recovery of data?
output: Some simple tips for backup and recovery of data include regularly backing up all important data, keeping backups in multiple locations, encrypting sensitive data, limiting access to backups, and verifying backups regularly. It is also important to have a reliable recovery system in place to ensure data can be restored quickly in the event of an emergency. Additionally, it is important to have an automated backup system, such as cloud services, to ensure minimal disruption in the event of a disaster.

instruction: Junk food bachon ko kaise mutaasir karta hai?
output:
London: bachon ke liye ‘junk food’ ka istemal intehai khatarnaak hai, maahireen ka maanna hai ke bachon ko har tarah ke junk food se parhez karaya jaye, kyun ke kam umri mein ‘junk food’ ke intehai manfi asraat martab ho sakte hain.

Ghizai maahireen ka kehna hai ke zyada junk food istemal karne walay bachon ke istihalay (metabolism) mein manfi tabdeeliyan roonuma ho jati hain, motapay ke saath saath un ke khoon ka bahaao bhi mutaasir ho jata hai. Kyun ke junk food mein masnooi mithaas, muzir chikanaiyan aur deegar ajza ko shamil kiya jata hai.

Maahireen ke mutabiq junk food mein ghizaiyat kam aur calories ki miqdar bohat zyada hoti hai. Dosra yeh ke kam umri mein bachon ke liye motawazan ghiza ki zaroorat hoti hai, junk food ka istemal karne walay aur parhez karne walay bachon ka muwazna kiya gaya to jin bachon ne junk food ka istemal kiya tha un mein motapay ka rujhan bohat

output:

Insaan ke liye Allah Ta'ala ne kurrah arz par be shumar naimatein utaari hain jin se woh mustafeed hota hai. In hi mein aik khushk mewa jaat mein shamil kishmish hai jo dekhne to bohat chhota sa mewa hai lekin is mein sehat ka anmol khazana chhupa hua hai.

Angoor ko khushk karke banaya janay wala yeh khushk mewa har mausam mein insaan ko faida pohanchata hai jo deegar mewa jaat ki nisbat kam qeemat aur har aik ki dastaras mein hai. Maahireen tib kehte hain ke rozana aik cup kishmish pani mein bhigo kar peene se insani quwat madafiat mazboot aur kai beemariyon se tahaffuz milta hai.

Maahireen sehat ke mutabiq kishmish mein iron ke zakhair paye jate hain. Yeh khushk mewa vitamin C aur deegar anti-oxidants se bharpoor amrit ka darja rakhta hai. Fiber aur poly

instruction: Explain why deep learning is a form of artificial intelligence.
output: Deep learning is a form of artificial intelligence because it is inspired by the functionality of the human brain. Deep learning architectures, such as neural networks and convolutional networks, are used to identify patterns and relationships in data. By using multiple layers, deep learning is able to detect complex non-linear patterns and make decisions based on those patterns. Deep learning algorithms have the capability to learn and adapt over time, similar to human intelligence.

instruction: Mujhe waliden ki mohabbat ke bare mein kuch ash'aar likh kar dein:
output:
Ji zaroor, yeh rahe chand ash'aar waliden ki mohabbat ke liye:
Maan baap ki mohabbat, un ke baghair kuch bhi nahi,
Dil ki gehrayon mein, un ki mohabbat hai chhupi.
Jab duniya ki laraaiyon mein, hum be panah hotay hain,
Maan baap ki duaon mein, un ki mohabbat hai sarchhupi.

Maan baap ki mohabbat, laakhon ki qeemat hai,
Yeh pyar ki kahani, har dil ki zabani.

Mehnaton ki raton mein, woh roshni ki tarah hotay hain,
Hamesha saath hotay hain, dil ki baton ko samajhtay hain.
Jab duniya ki tangiyon mein, hum kamzor hotay hain,
Maan baap ki himayat mein, un ki mohabbat hai be misaal.

Maan baap ki mohabbat, laakhon ki qeemat hai,
Yeh pyar ki kahani, har dil ki zabani.

Jannat mein bhi parsaiyon ko, un ki mohabbat ka ehtram hai,
Maan baap ki dekh bhaal mein, sukoon aur suwa hai chhupa.

Maan baap ki mohabbat, laakh

instruction: Arch Duke Franz Ferdinand ke qatl ne pehli jang-e-azeem ke aaghaz mein kis tarah kirdar ada kiya?
output: 28 June 1914 ko Sarajevo mein Arch Duke Franz Ferdinand ka qatl, Europe mein pehlay se kashida siyasi mahaul ke liye aik utprerak ke tor par kaam kiya. Ferdinand ke qatl ne Austria-Hungary aur Serbia ke darmiyan kashidgi ko barha diya, jis ki wajah se Austria-Hungary ne Serbia ko ultimatum jari kiya. Serbia ke rad-e-amal ko ghair tasalli bakhsh samjha gaya, jis ne Austria-Hungary ko jang ka elaan karne par majboor kiya. Ittehadon ka paicheeda nizaam, khas tor par Triple Entente aur Triple Alliance, us waqt amal mein aaya jab qoumein tanaza ki taraf kheenchin gayin. Russia, France, Germany aur Britain un badi quwaton mein shamil thay jinhn ne apne aap ko is mein uljhaaya jo ibtidaai tor par aik ilaqai tanaza tha, is tarah ise aalmi tanaza mein tabdeel kar diya.

instruction:
Darj zail jumle ka tarjuma karein:
Good health is a holistic concept, encompassing physical fitness, mental and emotional well-being, and more. It includes social connections and relationships, spiritual fulfillment, intellectual engagement, and environmental considerations. Financial stability is crucial, as financial stress can impact mental health. Developing emotional resilience helps individuals cope with life's challenges. Cultural sensitivity and diversity acceptance contribute to a sense of belonging and overall well-being. Achieving work-life balance is important, as chronic work-related stress can harm mental and emotional health. Ultimately, good health involves nurturing various interconnected dimensions, ensuring a well-rounded and high-quality life.
output: Sehat aik mukammal tasawwur hai jis mein jismani tandurusti, zehanti aur jazbati haalat shamil hai, aur is mein samaji rishton aur talluqaat, roohani itminan, fikri mashghooliyat, aur maholi par asraat bhi shamil hain. Maali istehkam bohat ahem hai, kyun ke maali dabao zehanti sehat par asar andaaz ho sakta hai. Jazbati mazbooti ko tarbiyat dena afraad ko zindagi ki challenges ka samna karne mein madad faraham karta hai. Saqaafati samajh aur mukhtalifiyat ki qabooliyat kisi ki mutaliqa pesha wari aur jazbati haalat ko behtar

instruction: Share the scientific definition of the term “gravity”.
output: Gravity is an attractive force that exists between any two objects in the universe due to their masses. It is the force that causes objects to be pulled toward each other, like a planet orbiting the sun, or objects falling to the ground. According to the theory of general relativity, gravity is caused by the curvature of space-time.

instruction: Name three characteristics of the Ancient Egyptian civilization.
output: The Ancient Egyptian civilization was advanced for its time, having complex systems of writing, advanced architecture and engineering, and a powerful centralized government. Additionally, the Ancient Egyptians developed a complex system of religious beliefs and an advanced knowledge of astronomy and astrology. Lastly, they also created mummification techniques and advanced irrigation systems.

instruction: Write a poem about self-discovery.
output:
I yearn to find what awaits beyond
To explore the unknown and go beyond
I set out on this winding road, unsure
But I will find what I'm searching for

My journey will be one of discovery
A personal quest of discovery
I will learn when I rise and when I fall
To build a strength that nothing can stall

My will to keep on ever growing
Learning something new, ever knowing
I strive for answers, for knowledge and might
I step forward bold into the night

For I will discover who I am
The path I travel, my own master plan
It's a journey I must take on my own
For a deeper part of me I'll hone

instruction: Assam riyasat ke baare mein batain
output:
Assam Bharat ki riyasaton mein aik riyasat se. Yeh riyasat, Bharat ke shumal mashriq mein waqeh hai. Is ka dar ul hukumat Dispur. Yeh riyasat qaumi parkon ke liye mashhoor hai.

Qaumi Park
Bharat ka mashhoor janwar gainda (“rhinoceros“) Kaziranga qaumi park, Assam mein.
Assam aur nabatiyat
Riyasat Assam ghane jangalon se, bilkhusoos sarsabz baghon se bhari riyasat.

Assam mein orchids bakasrat paye jate hain. Aik qisam - bhato phool ya Vanda coerulea, 'Blue Orchid'.
Yeh asli Vanda coerulea hai, 'Blue Orchid'.
Assam mein bohat sare qaumi park, parindon ke sanctuary. Jo sayyahoon ke kashish ka markaz.

instruction: Mughlia Saltanat ke zawal mein maashi awamil ne kaise kirdar ada kiya?
output:
Maashi bad-intizami Mughlia Saltanat ke zawal ka aik aham ansar hai. Israaf fauji akhrajat, barhti hui bureaucracy aur raj'at pasand revenue system ki wajah se Saltanat ko apne maali wasail par musalsal dabao ka samna karna para. Zamindari nizam par inhisar, jo ke zameeni mahsulat ki wasooli ki aik shakal hai, kisanon ke baray paimane par istihsal aur maashi tafawut ko taiz karne ka bais bana. Mazeed bar-aan, Mughal hukmaran badalte hue maashi manzar name ke sath muwaafiqat karne mein nakaam rahe jis ki nishandahi European samandari tijarat ki amad se hui.

Maashi jamood ne Saltanat ko maali tor par tanaav ka shikar kar diya, fauj aur intizamiya ke barhtay hue mutalibat ko pura karne mein nakaam raha. Is maashi kamzori ne Mughlia Saltanat ko bairooni hamlon ka shikar bana diya aur is ki khud-mukhtari ke khatme mein aham kirdar ada kiya.

instruction: Generate a poem that expresses joy.
output:
Joy flows through me like a river clear,
Bringing laughter and bliss to my soul to hear.

The world is bright and wonderful, I can see,
Making every moment something happy and free.

My heart feels light, my cares have flown,
As I discover what happiness gives me alone.

I open my arms and accept the joy,
Bringing life to my song, so sweet like a toy.

Every moment is a precious gift,
That I savor and never let drift.

instruction: Write a definition of a specific term.
input: Natural Language Processing
output: Natural Language Processing (NLP) is an interdisciplinary field of computer science, artificial intelligence, and linguistics. It is concerned with understanding how humans communicate and how computers can gain information from and communicate with humans using natural language. NLP algorithms are leveraged to analyze or process textual data by interpreting and understanding natural language, as well as generating natural language based on provided data.

instruction: Design a homepage for a new website.
output: The homepage of the website should prominently feature the website's logo and title. There should also be a prominent search box for visitors to easily find what they are looking for. Below the search box should be the main navigation, offering visitors the ability to browse different sections of the website. The page should also contain a brief summary of the website and its features. Finally, the page should also feature an opt-in newsletter to capture visitors' email addresses.

instruction: Tell me a story in Urdu
output:
Unwan: Gumshuda tota
Das saal ki Zainab ko chiriyan bohat achi lagti thin.Urti, phudakti, chehchehati chiriyan dekh kar woh bohat khush hoti.Australian aur hare hare totay use khas tor par achay lagtay thay.Ek baar us ne apni mummi se kaha ke woh tota palna chahti hai lekin mummi ne kaha ke totay qaid mein rehna pasand nahi karte, unhein apni azadi bohat pyari hoti hai.
Ghar ke samne darakhton par bohat si chiriyan rehti hain.Khoob choon choon karti hain, unhein dekha karo.Zainab ne mummi ki baat maan li aur tota khareedne ki zid chhor di.School se anay ke baad balcony mein kharay ho kar tarah tarah ki chiriyon ko aur samne ghar walon ke Australian totay ko dekhti.
Ek din Zainab shaam ko kamre mein aayi to dekha ek Australian tota us ke kamre mein baitha hua hai.

Chhota sa grey rang ka, lal lal aankhein, patli si dum thi.Woh dum lagataar upar neeche hila raha tha.Is totay ko us ne pehlay kabhi nahi dekha

instruction: Write a persuasive argument for why students should take a break from their studies and get outside to explore nature on a regular basis.
output: Going outside to explore nature can be beneficial for students in many ways. First, getting outside provides a welcome break from the stresses of studying. Being in nature can also help reduce stress and promote mental clarity, as well as provide motivation to keep working hard. Additionally, getting outside and exploring nature can also help students develop appreciation for the natural world and all that it has to offer. With so many benefits, students should make it a priority to take breaks from their studies to get outside and explore nature.

instruction: Franchise muahiday aur licensing muahiday ke darmiyan bunyadi farq kya hai?
output:
Franchising masnoo'at aur services ko taqseem karne ka aik tareeqa hai. Franchisor (business ka awwaleen maalik) aik fees ke ewaz apne trade mark (tijarati nishan) ya tijarati naam ke istemal ke liye aik license deta hai. Franchisee (wo shakhs jo franchise khareedta hai) ko ijaazat hoti hai ke wo franchisor ka tijarati naam aur us ke brand ka naam istemal kare. Bator aik franchisee ke, aap franchise ke munafa mein se franchisor ko aik khaas raqam (royalty) ada karte hain. Aam tor par, franchisor aap ke saath aik franchise agreement ya muahida banaye ga jis mein franchise ko chalane ke baare mein tafseelaat shamil hongi.

Franchise ke muahiday mein, aik karobari model aur muawinat faraham ki jati hai, jabke licensing muahida danishwarana imlaak ko istemal karne ki ijaazat deta hai.

Licensing muahida (Licensing Agreement) aik qanooni dastavez hoti hai jo do fareeqon ke darmiyan hoti hai: license dene wala (Licensor)

instruction: Africa ke bare mein batain
output:
Africa raqbe ke lehaaz se kurrah arz ka doosra bara bar azam, jis ke shumal mein Bahira Room, mashriq mein Bahr-e-Hind aur maghrib mein Bahr-e-Oqiyanus waqeh hai.

Dilkash nazaron, ghane junglaat, wasee sehraon aur gehri wadiyon ki sarzameen, jahan aaj 53 mumalik abad hain aur un ke baasi kai zabanain boltay hain.

Mehal-e-waqoo
Africa ke shumali aur junubi hisay nihayat khushk aur garam hain jin ka beshtar hissa sehraon par phela hua hai. Khat-e-istwa ke gird-o-nawah ghane junglaat hain. Mashriqi Africa mein azeem wadi al-shiq ke nateeje mein gehri wadiyan tashkeel paain jin mein kai badi jheelen bhi waqeh hain.

Bar-e-azam ke maghrib mein darya-e-Niger bahta hai jo wasee daldali delta banata hua Bahr-e-Oqiyanus mein ja girta hai. Is ke mashriq mein darya-e-Congo Africa ke ghane istwai junglaat se guzarta hai. Bar-e-azam ke mashriqi hisay mein azeem wadi al-shiq aur Ethiopia ke

instruction: Factory Act 1948 ke taht sehat ke hawale se aajiron ke liye aath ahem zimmedariyan Urdu mein | Eight Important responsibilities for the employers with regard to health under the Factories Act, 1948 In Urdu
output:
1. Safai
Factory ko saaf suthra aur kisi bhi nalay waghera se nikalne walay bahaao se paak rakhne ke liye khaas tor par darj zail ehtiyati tadabeer ikhtiyar ki jani chahiyein:

(a) Rozana jhaaru laga kar gandagi ko door kiya jaye,

(b) Har kaam ke kamray ke farsh ko hafte mein kam az kam aik dafa dho kar, jahan zaroori ho, jarasim kash ka istemal kar ke saaf kiya jaye.

(c) Nikaasi aab ka moassar nizaam hona chahiye,

(d) Safed dhulai aur painting makhsoos waqfon par ki jani chahiye.

2. Fazla aur fazlay ko thikane lagana:

Fazlay aur fazlay ko thikane lagane ke liye munasib intizaamaat kiye jayein.

3. Ventilation aur darja hararat:
Har kaam ke kamray mein taza hawa ki gardish ke zariye munasib ventilation hona chahi

instruction: Kya waqt ke tasawwur ki koi maroosi haqeeqat hai, ya yeh insani tameer hai?
output: Waqt ki noiyat aik falsafiyana tahqiqat hai jo tabi'at se milti hai. Kuch falsafiyon ka kehna hai ke waqt aik maroosi haqeeqat hai, jo insani idraak se azaad hai, jab ke doosron ka kehna hai ke yeh aik insani tameer hai jo duniya ko samajhne ke liye musallat ki gayi hai. Bahas mein waqti guzarnay ki noiyat, "maujooda" ke tasawwur aur waqt musalsal hai ya mujarrad.

instruction: Hero aur villain se paray: hum riwayati bayaniye se aagay kaise barh sakte hain aur Maratha-Durrani tanazuat ki aik ahem ainak ke zariye tashreeh kaise kar sakte hain?
output: Riwayati tor par tahzeebon ke tasadum ke tor par Abdali ko villain ke tor par aur Marathon ko hero ke tor par paish kiya gaya hai, is ki mazeed ameeq tashreeh zaroori hai. Mutanaw nuqta nazar ko tasleem karna bohat zaroori hai, yeh tasleem karte hue ke dono fareeqon ke paas apne tareekhi siyaq o sabaq ke mutabiq jawaz aur muharrikat thay. Sirf rehnumaon par tawajjo markooz karne ke ilawa, aam faujiyon, shehrion aur pasmandah grohon ke tajurbaat ka jaiza lena tanazuat ke asraat ki aik mukammal tasweer faraham karta hai. Achai aur burai ki saada dastano ki tashkeel se un jungon ko hawa dene walay siyasi, iqtisadi, mazhabi, aur samaji amil ke paicheeda ta'aamul ki gehri feham hasil hoti hai. Maratha-Durrani tanazuat ko aik bareek ainak

instruction: Describe an unusual vacation spot.
output: One unusual vacation spot is The Great Blue Hole in Belize. This is an immense submarine sinkhole with a diameter of over 300 metres and a depth of 125 metres. It is an incredible sight to see, with its unique azure blue colour standing out against the surrounding turquoise Caribbean Sea. There are guided scuba diving tours available, which take adventurers to the bottom of the Hole, where they can observe the unusual marine life and view the limestone formations. Above the surface, visitors can marvel at the surrounding coral reef, which is full of vibrant hues and diverse species of fish.

instruction: Zehant se kya murad hai? Is ko kaise napa ja sakta hai aur is ki kitni aqsam hain?
output:
Zehant (Intelligence) asal mein aql (Mind) ki woh salahiyat ya khasiyat hoti hai jis ki madad se woh kisi baat ya tajurbe ka idraak o feham kar sakti ho yaani is ko samajh sakti ho. Is samajh bujh ke amal mein bohat si zehni khususiyaat shamil hoti hain jin mein sabab, mansooba, baseerat aur tajreed (Abstraction) waghera shamil hain.

1) Zehant ka hissa (IQ)
2) Jazbati miqdar (EQ)
3) Samaji hissa (SQ)
4) Museebat ki miqdar (AQ)
1. Zehant ka hissa (IQ): Yeh aap ke feham ki satah ka paimana hai.  Aap ko riyazi ko hal karne, cheezen yaad karne aur sabaq yaad karne ke liye IQ ki zarurat hai.
2. Jazbati iqtabas (EQ): Yeh aap ki doosron ke sath aman barqarar rakhne, waqt ki pabandi, zimmedar, imaandar, hudood ka ehteram, aajiz, haqeeqi aur khayal

instruction: Canva kya hai?
output: Canva aik online graphic design platform hai jo sarfeen ko designs, presentations, posters, dastawizat, aur deegar basri mawaad takhleeq karne ki sahulat faraham karta hai. instruction: Generate five different jokes about physics.

instruction: Explain the differences between the Central American countries and the South American countries.
output: Central American countries are located in the southern part of North America, south of Mexico and north of South America. They include Costa Rica, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras, Nicaragua and Panama. South American countries are located in the southern hemisphere of the American continent, south of Central America and including Colombia, Venezuela, Brazil, Argentina, Peru, Bolivia, Paraguay, Ecuador, Chile, Guyana, Suriname and French Guiana. In general, the Central American countries are more tropical and have more rainforests, while the South American countries are more mountainous and have deserts and grassy plains. Additionally, the Central American countries have more Spanish-speaking populations, while South American countries have more Portuguese-speaking populations.

instruction: Junubi Asia mein Sikandar ki muhim ki derpa ahmiyat kya hai?
output: Junubi Asia mein Alexander ki muhim tareekh mein aik qabil-e-zikr waqia bani hui hai, jis mein qadeem research aur fouji fatahat ki had tak numaish ki gayi hai. instruction: Kya AI insani khayalat ko tasweeri shakal bhi de sakay gi?
output:
Artificial Intelligence (AI) aanay walay waqt mein insaniyat ke liye khatarnaak sabit ho sakti hai kyun ke scientiston ka kehna hai ke AI bohat jald insano ke khayalat ko parhnay aur un ki tasweerain bananay ki salahiyat bhi hasil kar le gi.

Singapore ki aik university mein aisi neuro technology par kaam kiya ja raha hai jo masnooi zahanat ki madad se logon ke khayalat jaan kar un ko tasweeri shakal de sakay gi.

Neuro technology aur masnooi zahanat insani soch ke liye bohat bara khatra ho sakta hai, maharreen ka kehna hai ke neuro technology ko masnooi zahanat ke algorithm ke zariye supercharge kiya gaya hai jo data ko is tarah se process kar sakta hai jaisa pehlay kabhi mumkin nahi tha.

Dosri janib awami raye hai ke yeh baat namumkin hai kyun ke jab tak aap bolain ge nahi ya apne khayalat ko screen par type nahi karain ge aap ke system ko pattern ka ilm nahi ho sakta. Lihaza humein Artificial Intelligence (AI) ke hawalay se itna khauf phail

instruction: Explain the differences between scalar and vector quantities.
output: Scalar quantities have only magnitude or size, while vector quantities have both magnitude and direction. Scalar quantities can be expressed in numbers, while vector quantities require a direction to be expressed accurately. Examples of scalars include mass, temperature, and time, while examples of vectors include force, velocity, and momentum.

instruction: Aik shandaar brand ke liye mukammal munafa margin kya hoti hai jo aik zaraye ki shuruat kar raha ho?
output:
Aik shandaar brand jo aik zaraye ki shuruat kar raha hai, us ke liye mukammal munafa margin mukhtalif awamil par munhasir hoti hai, jaise khusoosi san'at, market ki haalat, qeematon ke strategy, aur brand ke kul karobari namoone waghera. Waqe'at mein, is sawal ka koi aik thos jawab nahi hota, kyun ke munafa margin ko brand ke ahdaf aur maali projections ke dhundlay tajziye par mabni karna chahiye.

Yahan kuch ghour karne walay nuqat hain jo munasib munafa margin taayun karne mein madad faraham kar sakti hain:

1. **San'at ke mayaar:** Usi san'at ya zaraye ki mein dusre shandaar brandon ke munafa margin ki tehqiq karein. Yeh zaraye ki mushaba market mein kya mumkin ho sakta hai, is ke liye qeemti isharat faraham kar sakti hain.

2. **Brand ki positioning:** Brand ki position aur target market ko madde nazar rakhein. Shandaar brand aam tor par ghair shandaar brandon ki mu

Woh meethay pani ke bunyadi zaraye, zara'at, insani bastiyon aur sanati sargarmiyon mein muawin karte hain. Darya ke kinaron ke saath zarkhez selaabi maidan ghizaiyat se bharpur mitti faraham karte hain, paidawari kaashatkari mein sahulat faraham karte hain aur ibtidaai zarai muashron ke qayam ke qabil hotay hain. Darya ke kinare bohat se qadeem aur jadeed shehron ke strategic maqamat iqtisadi aur samaji taraqqi ke sahulat kar ke tor par daryaaon ki ahmiyat ko ujagar karte hain.

instruction: Socialism ke bunyadi aqayed kya hain?
output: Socialism sarmaya daari ke baraks khara hai. Yeh zaraye pedaawar ki ijtimai ya riyasti malkiyat aur daulat ki dobaara taqseem ki wakalat karta hai. Bunyadi khayaal wasail aur san'aton ko community ya hukoomat ke haath mein de kar maashi adam masawaat ko kam karna hai. Socialism ki mukhtalif shakalain mojood hain, democratic socialism se le kar, jo socialism ke anasir ko jamhoori governance ke saath jorti hai, zyada amrana shakalon tak. Socialism aksar tabqati jad-o-jehd aur daulat ke tafawut ke masail ko hal karne ki koshish karta hai. Naqideen ka istadlal hai ke yeh infiradi targeebat aur ikhtira'at ko rok sakta hai, jabke haami aik zyada masawi muashra banane ki salahiyat ko ujagar karte hain.

Agarche ibtidaai Mughal shehnshah fun, adab aur fun tameer ke maroof sarparast thay, baad ke hukmaranon ne saqafati josh o jazbe mein wazeh kami ka muzahira kiya. Fikri husool mein kam hoti dilchaspi ne Saltanat ko fikri tor par jaraseem se paak kar diya, jis se yeh badaltay huay waqt ke sath kam muwafiqat pazeer ho gayi.

Jaisay jaisay saqafati aur fikri tawanaiyan khatam hoti gayeen, Mughalia Saltanat ne apne aap ko androni ikhtilaf aur bairooni dabao ke paicheeda ja

instruction: Describe the process of obtaining a driver's license in your country.
output:
The process of obtaining a driver's license in the United States generally involves the following steps:

1. Enrolling in a driver's education course, which is often offered by an accredited high school or state-approved driving school. The course will cover a variety of topics such as traffic laws, proper vehicle operation, and how to handle hazardous conditions.

2. Once the driver's education course is completed, the individual must take and pass a written exam to obtain a learner's permit.

3. The individual must then complete a supervisor-monitored “behind the wheel” training course, which consists of practical experience driving in real-world conditions.

4. Once the supervised training is completed, the individual must take and pass a road test.

5. Finally, the individual must submit the necessary paperwork and pay the applicable fee to receive their driver's license.

instruction: Create a quiz about people in the United States in the 1800s
output:
Q1. Who were the founding fathers of the United States? 
A. Thomas Jefferson, John Adams, George Washington, James Madison

Q2. What was the major export in the early 1800s? 
A. Cotton was the major export in the early 1800s.

Q3. What type of transportation was available in the 1800s? 
A. Horse-drawn wagons, boats and canals, and stagecoaches were common forms of transportation in the 1800s. 

Q4. What type of entertainment was available in the 1800s?
A. Popular entertainment in the 1800s included theatrical plays, operas, concerts, and circuses.

instruction: Explain why this policy was introduced.
input: The single-use plastic reduction policy in the UK
output: The single-use plastic reduction policy in the UK was introduced to help reduce waste in order to protect the environment. This policy is part of the increased public awareness of the effects that plastic waste has on the environment, and is aimed at increasing the use of more sustainable alternatives.

instruction: Suggest an efficient way to proofread an article.
output: An efficient way to proofread an article is to read it aloud, which makes it easier to pick up on typos and grammatical errors. Read through the article twice, once for content and a second time for proofreading. If possible, have someone else read through the article to get a second opinion as fresh eyes can also identify mistakes that you may have missed. Additionally, use grammar checkers or online proofreading tools to quickly detect any errors.

instruction: What methods can be used to improve the accuracy of machine learning models?
output: There are several methods that can be used to improve the accuracy of machine learning models, such as data augmentation, feature engineering, hyperparameter tuning, model ensembling, and transfer learning. Data augmentation involves creating more data points by manipulating existing data, while feature engineering involves selecting and constructing features that are useful for the model. Hyperparameter tuning involves changing the model settings to optimize performance, and model ensembling combines various models to increase accuracy. Transfer learning allows a model to use knowledge from one problem and apply it to another.

instruction: Istanbul ke baare mein bataiye:
output: Istanbul (talafuz: /ˌɪstænˈbʊl/, [8][9]Turki zaban: İstanbul [isˈtanbuɫ] ( suniye)) jise maazi mein Bazantiyum aur Qustuntuniya ke naam se bhi jana jata tha Turkiye ka sab se zyada abadi wala shehar aur mulk ka maashi, saqaafati aur tareekhi markaz hai. Istanbul Eurasia ka bain baraazmi shehar bhi hai jo Bahira Marmara aur Bahira Aswad ke darmiyan mein Aabnaye Bosphorus ke dono kinaron par waqeh hai. Yeh aabnaye Asia ko Europe se juda karti hai. Is ka tijarati aur tareekhi markaz Europi janib hai aur is ki abadi ka aik tehayi hissa Aabnaye Bosphorus ke Asiai kinare ke muzafati ilaqon mein rehta hai.[10] Is ke metropolitan ilaqa mein taqreeban dedh crore ki majmooi abadi hai[3] jis ki bunyaad par Istanbul ka shumaar duniya ke sab se baray shehron mein hota hai. Aalmi tor par yeh duniya ka paanchwan sab se bara shehar aur Europe ka sab se bara shehar hai. Nez yeh

Istanbul Eurasia ka bain baraazmi shehar bhi hai jo Bahira Marmara aur Bahira Aswad ke darmiyan mein Aabnaye Bosphorus ke dono kinaron par waqeh hai. Yeh aabnaye Asia ko Europe se juda karti hai. Is ka tijarati aur tareekhi markaz Europi janib hai aur is ki abadi ka aik tehayi hissa Aabnaye Bosphorus ke Asiai kinare ke muzafati ilaqon mein rehta hai.[10] Is ke metropolitan ilaqa mein taqreeban dedh crore ki majmooi abadi hai[3] jis ki bunyaad par Istanbul ka shumaar duniya ke sab se baray shehron mein hota hai. Aalmi tor par yeh duniya ka paanchwan sab se bara shehar aur Europe ka sab se bara shehar hai. Nez yeh

instruction: Name one legal action against cyberbullying.
output: One legal action taken against cyberbullying is civil lawsuits. Civil lawsuits give victims the chance to obtain relief from damages resulting from the cyberbullying, such as compensatory or punitive damages. Victims may seek a court order requiring the cyberbully to halt the activity or seek financial compensation for damages caused by the cyberbullying.

instruction: Design a four-tier cloud computing architecture.
output: A four-tier cloud architecture consists of four components arranged into tiers: a user-facing application at the top, a middle tier of services, a data storage layer in the middle of the stack, and an infrastructure layer at the bottom. The application tier provides a user interface for interaction with the cloud services, the services layer provides the business logic to process data, the data storage layer stores and accesses the data, and the infrastructure layer provides the computing resources and handles tasks such as authentication, scaling, and monitoring.

instruction: Aik darar waadi ki tashkeel aur khususiyaat bayan karein.
output: Aik darar waadi aik arziyati khususiyaat hai jo tectonic plateon ki mukhtalif harkat ke nateeje mein hoti hai, jis ki wajah se zameen ki parat phail jati hai aur toot jati hai. Yeh amal bunyadi tor par mukhtalif plate ki hudood par hota hai, jahan magma khala ko pur karne ke liye mantle se uthta hai, nai crust banata hai aur aik waadi banata hai. Darar ki waadiyan aksar alag alag khususiyaat ki numayish karti hain, bashumool faulting aur upar uthane se banne wali khari ataraf, aik chapti ya aahista se dhalwan neeche, aur aik markazi darar jahan aatish fishan ki sargarmi ho sakti hai. Aik qabil-e-zikr misaal Mashriqi Afriqi Rift hai, aik tectonic plate ki boundary jahan African plate Nubian aur Somali plateon mein taqseem ho rahi hai.

instruction: Explain the conflict between the U.S. and North Korea in 3 sentences.
output: The conflict between the United States and North Korea is rooted in the Korean War, which began in 1950. The U.S. seeks to de-nuclearize the Korean Peninsula, while North Korea seeks to maintain its nuclear program. This clash in objectives has led to a series of diplomatic standoffs and economic sanction exchanges that have created rising tensions between the two countries.

instruction: Pak fauj mulki taraqqi aur qudrati aafaat se nimatne ki koshishon mein kya kirdar ada karti hai?
output:
Apne bunyadi difa'i kamon se hat kar, Pak fauj mulk ke wasee tar mufadaat ki khidmat ke liye apne azm ko zahir karte hue, qaumi taraqqi aur aafaat se nimatne ki koshishon mein fa'aal tor par hissa dalti hai. Qudrati aafaat jaise zalzale, selaab aur dusre hungami halaat mein fauj fori imdad aur insani imdad faraham karne mein aham kirdar ada karti hai.

Disaster relief mein fauj ki shumooliyat bohat si sargarmiyon par mushtamil hai, jismain talaash aur bachao ki karwaiyan, tibi imdad, imdadi samaan ki taqseem, aur zaroori khidmaat ki bahali shamil hain. Is ka fori rad-e-amal aur tanzeemi salahiyatein ise aafaat ke asraat ko kam karne aur mutasir communityon ki tameer-e-nau mein madad karne mein aik bunyadi quwat banati hain.

Mazeed bar'aan, fauj aksar bunyadi dhancha

instruction: Nasha-e-Sania ne Europe mein riaziyati dilchaspi aur ikhtira ke ihyaa mein kis tarah taawun kiya?
output: 14 wein se 17 wein sadi par muhiṭ nasha-e-sania ne riazi samait mukhtalif fikri sargarmiyon ke ihyaa ke daur ko nishan zad kiya. Printing press ki ijaad ke sath qadeem Yunani aur Romi matn ki dobara daryaft ne riazi ke ilm ko phailane mein sahulat faraham ki. Leonardo da Vinci, Nicolaus Copernicus, aur Johannes Kepler jaise riazi daanon ne geometry, falakiyat, aur sayyaron ki harkat ki tafheem mein ahem kirdar ada kiya. Nasha-e-sania ne scientific inqilab ki bunyaad rakhi, jis mein riazi ke tareeqe scientific tahqiqat ka laazmi juz ban gaye.

instruction: Noori saal se kya muraad hai, is mein kitna faasla tay hota hai?
output:
Aik noori saal woh faasla hai jo roshni aik saal mein tay karti hai. Ise angrezi mein light-year kaha jata hai jis ke mukhaffaf ly ko is ki alamat ke tor par istemal kiya jata hai. Mukhtalif pemayeshi nizaamon ki ikaiyon mein yeh faasla zail mein hai:

15­10 × 9.4607304725808 meter (qareeban 9.461 peta meter)
12­10 × 5.878625373183 + 1397­/­849 (qareeban 60 kharab) mile
63241.077 falakiati ikaiyat
Is faaslay ki mazeed wazeh tareef is tarah hai: woh faasla jo aik nooriya (photon photon) azad khala mein kisi bhi saqli ya maqnatisee maidan se lamatnahai faasla par aik Julian (86400 daqiqon ke 365.25 din) mein tay kare. Noori saal ko aksar sitaron se zameen ke faaslay ki pemaish ke liye istemal kiya jata hai: yaani noori saal waqt ki ikai nahi hai. Falaki

instruction: Urdu zaban mein klasiki ghazal likhein.
output:
Yaqeenan Urdu zaban ki aik ghazal yeh hai:
Kahin hosh hai kahin bekhudi kahin tishnagi kahin jaam hai
Mere saqiya yeh ajeeb tar tere maikade ka nizaam hai
Koi raaz-e-dil hai na rehnuma koi mudai na hai mudda
Mujhe manzilon ki khabar nahin mera ishq mera imaam hai
Mere shehr-e-dil ki faseel par yeh jo roshni ke hain qafiye
Mere loh-e-dil pe likha hua mere hum nafas tera naam hai
Jo ho nabelad tere zikr se na ho aashna teri fikr se
Woh ruku koi ruku hai woh qiyaam koi qiyaam hai
Meri bekhudi bhi ajeeb tar meri maikashi bhi ajeeb tar
Main nazar se peeta hoon Sheikh ji yeh halaal hai ke haraam hai
Meri khalwaton mein suroor hai meri jalwaton ka pata nahin
Koi har ghadi mere saath hai koi mujh se mehwe kalaam hai
Mere humsafar hai jo kahkashan mein sunaoon kis ko yeh daastan
Bari mo

instruction: Describe some of the new technologies that are driving innovation.
output: Recent years have seen tremendous advancements in technology that are rapidly transforming our world. For example, artificial intelligence (AI) has made significant strides in advancing the capabilities of computers by enabling them to learn and adapt. The Internet of Things (IoT) has enabled billions of devices to be connected to the internet, making data easier to collect and analyze. Virtual and augmented reality are transforming the way people experience and interact with the real world. 3D printing has allowed for revolutionary breakthroughs in manufacturing, allowing companies to produce complex parts quickly and cost-effectively. Lastly, blockchain technology has made transactions and record keeping more secure, transparent, and efficient.

instruction: Barwaqt neend kin bemariyon se bacha sakti hai?
output:
Alrajul website par shaya' mazmoon mein kaha gaya hai ke science dano'n ke mutabiq jo shakhs sota hai us waqt ko jism ke liye nuqsan deh nahi samjha ja sakta balki yeh waqt dimaagh ki hifazat aur jismani sehat ki hifazat ke tor par shumaar hota hai.
Jabke science dan raat ke auqat mein sonay ko tajdeed ka amal qarar detay hain jo dimaagh ke liye taskeen ka bais hota hai.
London mein University of Western Ontario se mansoob aik tehqiq ne sabit kiya ke insaan ko apne jism ki sehat ko barqarar rakhne aur khaas tor par apne dimaagh ki sehat ko barqarar rakhne ke liye rozana munasib waqt tak sona zaroori hai kyun ke yeh Alzheimer ke marz se bachanay ke liye mufeed hai.
Neend ke douran sar mein kya hota hai?
Germany ki University of Tubingen Neurobiology ke aik muhaqiq Albrecht Forster ne inkishaaf kiya hai ke neend ke douran kai saare kaam insaan ke dimaagh ke andar zindagi ke kisi doosre waqt se zyada jari rehte hain.

Construct an analogy to explain the function of a capacitor.
output: A capacitor can be thought of like a bucket of water, where the two plates act as the sides of the bucket. The electric charge is like the water in the bucket, and it builds up on the plates until it reaches its maximum capacity. Once the capacitor is full, no more charge can flow into the capacitor, just like a full bucket cannot fill with any more water.

instruction: Compare and contrast physical and digital storage devices.
output: Physical storage devices, such as hard drives, offer larger storage capacities and faster transfer speeds, however they require physical space and access to an appropriate power source. Digital storage devices, such as cloud storage or USB drives, are more portable and often less expensive for large amounts of data storage, but the transfer rates are slower, and access to the data requires an Internet connection.

instruction: UTS time zone ke baare mein kuch batain.
output:
Mutanasik aalmi waqt [hawala darkar] ya UTC, bunyadi waqt ka aalmi mayaar hai jis ke zariye duniya bhar mein ghadiyon aur un pe mojood waqt ko control kiya jata. Yeh ausat shamsi waqt ke taqreeban aik second ke andar andar hota hai (jaise UT1) 0° tool ul balad par (IERS hawala meridian mein is waqt istemaal shuda prime meridian ke taur par) aur isay din ki roshni ki bachat ke waqt ke liye adjust nahi kiya gaya hai. Yeh moassar tareeqay se Greenwich Mean Time (GMT) ka janasheen hai.

Duniya bhar mein waqt aur frequency transmission ke hum aahangeet 1 January 1960 ko shuru kiya gaya. UTC ko pehli baar bazabta taur par CCIR Recommendation 374, Standard-frequency and Time-Signal Emissions ke taur par 1963 mein apnaya gaya tha, lekin UTC ka sarkari mukhafaf aur Coordinated Universal Time (Fransisi masawi ke sath) ka sarkari angrezi naam 1967 tak nahi apnaya gaya tha. [1]

System ko kai baar adjust kiya gaya hai, jis mein aik mukhtasar muddat bhi shamil hai jis ke dour

instruction: Write a procedure for creating a vegetable soup.
output:
Procedure for Creating a Vegetable Soup: 
1. Gather the necessary ingredients: potatoes, carrots, celery, onions, garlic, chicken or vegetable broth, salt and pepper. 
2. Wash and peel the carrots and potatoes. Chop them into small cubes. 
3. Chop the celery, onion, and garlic into small pieces. 
4. Heat a large pot on the stovetop over medium heat and add a tablespoon of olive oil. 
5. Add the onions, garlic, and celery to the pot and cook for 3-4 minutes until softened. 
6. Add the potatoes and carrots to the pot and stir together. 
7. Pour the broth into the pot and increase the heat to bring the soup to a boil. 
8. Reduce the heat and simmer the soup for 15-20 minutes until the vegetables are tender. 
9. Add salt and pepper to taste. 
10. Serve the soup warm. Enjoy!

instruction: Kya dinosaur ke khatam hone ka 'muamma hal ho gaya hai?
output:
Taweel arsay yeh mana jata raha hai ke sayarche ke zameen ke saath takrane ke nateeje mein dinosaurs ke daur ka khatma ho gaya lekin muhaqqiqeen ne inkishaaf kiya hai ke ho sakta hai ke aik bunyadi amal ne dinosaurs ke khatme mein is se zyada bara kirdar kiya jo amooman pehle samjha jata tha.

Taqreeban chay karor 60 lakh saal qabl jab aik 10 se 15 kilometer chowra sayarcha Mexico ke jazeera numa Yucatan se takraya to is ke tasadum ne tabahi macha di. Tasadum ke nateeje mein jangalon mein aag lag gayi, zalzale aur bohat baray tsunami aaye jis se woh maholiyati nizaam tabah ho gaya jis ne podon aur jandaroon ko phalne phoolne ka mauqa faraham kar rakha tha.

Nature Geo Science nami jareeday mein shaya hone wali nai report mein muhaqqiqeen ka maanna hai ke agarche in deegar asraat ne dinosaur ki sinkron aqsam ko shadeed nuqsan pohanchaya ho ga lekin guzashte mutaliat mein aik

instruction: Explain how the ancient Egyptians were able to build the Great Pyramid.
output: The ancient Egyptians used primitive tools and large teams of workers to lift and move the massive limestone blocks necessary for building the Great Pyramid. These blocks were believed to have come from nearby quarries and were then transported by barge and sledges over rivers, lakes, and deserts to the construction site. It is estimated that the pyramid took 20-30 years for completion and involved hundreds of thousands of workers.

instruction: Hazrat Bilal Habshi ke baare mein humein mazeed bataen
output: Naam Bilal (ra) bin Rabah, walida ka naam Hamamah tha. Habshi nuzhad ghulam the. Makkah mein hi paida hue the. Un ke aaqa ka naam Jumah tha. Hazrat Bilal (ra) soorat mein to siyah the, magar Islam ne un ko Arabon ka sardar ban diya tha. Un ka dil shuru se shafaf tha. Un ko imaan us waqt naseeb hua, jab waadi Batha ki aksar gori makhlooq ghuroor aur husn ke zaum ki gumraahiyon thokrein kha rahi thi. Shuru mein jin buzurgon ne daai-e-haq Hazrat Muhammad (saw) ko labbaik kaha tha un saat mein se aik Habshi ghulam Hazrat Bilal (ra) the. Hazrat Bilal (ra) ne Islam ke liye bohat hi museebatein bardaasht keen. Tapti rait par lita diya jata. Dehakte angaaron par litae jate. Mushrikeen ke shararti ladke Hazrat Bilal (ra) ke galay mein rassi daal kar bazaaron mein phirate. Abu Jahl un ko sangrezon par lita kar upar se chak

instruction: Taleemi dore par mazmoon
output:
Aik taleemi dora ziada tar schoolon aur collegeon mein taleemi tajurbe ka hissa hai. Is tarah ke dore talaba ko mukhtalif mazameen ke bare mein khud ko samajhne mein madad karte hain.

Misaal ke tor par, school talaba ko taleemi doron par chidiya gharon aur parkon mein le ja sakte hain taake unhein nabatat aur hewanat se aashna kiya ja sake. Kitaab mein kisi janwar ya poday ki tasweer dekhna aik cheez hai aur use aamne samne dekhna doosri baat hai.

Isi tarah falakiyat ko samajhne ke liye sayyaron ka dora bohat mufeed hai. Collegeon mein bhi aisay tour karaye jate hain. Tareekh ke talaba ko tareekhi ahmiyat ke haamil maqamat ya ajaaib gharon mein le jaya ja sakta hai jahan qadeem namoone mehfooz hain. Purane qilon aur mahalat ya qadeem saltanatoun ke khandarat ka dora hamari aankhon ke samne tareekh ko zinda kar sakta hai. Is se humein andaza hota hai ke purane zamane mein log kaise rehte the. instruction: Generate an interesting way to reform laws concerning tax evasion.
output: To reform laws concerning tax evasion, government agencies should consider instituting an increased monetary penalty for offenders as well as a public shaming system. This system could include publicizing the names and photos of convicted tax evaders, or even their professional or family affiliations. In addition, government agencies should consider implementing methods of tracking self-employed individuals and businesses more closely, such as registering vehicles used for business purposes and requiring registration of those vehicles with tax authorities. Finally, there should be a greater emphasis on educating citizens about the penalties and implications associated with tax evasion. By improving awareness of the consequences of tax evasion, citizens will be more likely to comply with legal regulations and avoid the penalties that accompany breaking the law.

instruction: Social media ke liye muft mein mawaad takhleeq karne ka tareeqa
output:
1. **Mawaad ki manzami**: Apne mawaad ko munazzam tareeqay se paish karna ahem hai. Yeh aap ki posts ko mozoon tarteeb dene aur dekhne mein aasani paida karta hai.

2. **Mawaad ka takhleeqi kaam**: Apni tasweeren aur videos ko khud banayen. Aap apne zaati tajurbaat, takhayyulat, aur dilchaspiyon par mabni mawaad takhleeq kar saktay hain.

3. **Mawaad ka mauzoo**: Apne mawaad ko aik khaas mauzoo ke gird jama karein taake woh mukhatabeen ko dilchaspi dene mein madad faraham kare.

4. **Mawaad ka tajdeed**: Purane mawaad ko nai zindagi dene ke liye un mein tajdeed laayen. Maslan, purani post ko aik naye nazariye se dekhne ki koshish karein ya use taza maloomat ke saath update karein.

5. **Koi qeemti maloomat**: Mawaad mein aisi maloomat shamil kare

instruction: Write a dialogue between two friends discussing the pros and cons of online classes.
output:
Friend 1: Have you heard about online classes?
Friend 2: Yeah, I've heard a lot about them. What do you think about them? 
Friend 1: Well, it seems like there are pros and cons with online classes. On the one hand, it gives a lot of flexibility with timing and geography, so you don't have to worry about commuting or attendance. But on the other hand, you don't have the same level of interaction with the professor or other students. 
Friend 2: Yeah that's true. I've noticed that you don't get the same level of support as in a traditional classroom setting. But I think it's also important to note that there are a lot of resources available online that students can benefit from, such as video tutorials, chat rooms and discussion boards. 
Friend 1: That's definitely a plus. I think online classes should be taken in moderation, as there is no substitute for personal interaction when it comes to learning.

instruction: Khubani ke tibi fawaid aur is ki ahmiyat kya hai?
output:
Khubani mausam-e-garma ka aik aisa phal hai jo baa-asani dastiyab hota hai aur aksar logon ko pasand bhi hota hai, fawaid se bharpur khubani aik chhota sa phal hai jo aadoo aur aloochay jese phalon se mushabihat rakhta hai.

Khubani taza aur khushk dono halaton mein dastiyab hoti hai aur kisi bhi haalat mein is ka istemal sehat ke liye be had mufeed hai. Khubani mein do khas ghizai ajzaa Vitamin A aur beta carotene kaseer miqdar mein paye jate hain.

Vitamin A sehat mand jild ki tashkeel aur bahali mein aham kirdar ada karta hai, is ke zariye insaan ki tawajjo markooz karne ki salahiyat behtar hoti hai, sath hi madafati nizaam ki jaanch partaal ke liye bhi Vitamin A ka kirdar aham hai.
Khushk khubani sehat ke istemal se sehat par musbat nataij zahir hotay hain, kyun ke is mein bohat se ghizai ajzaa paye jate hain.

Taqreeban aik so gram khushk khubani

instruction: Give a few tips for improving memory and concentration.
output:
Here are a few tips for improving memory and concentration: 
1. Get enough sleep: To improve your concentration, aim for 7-8 hours of sleep every night. 
2. Exercise regularly: Exercise helps to improve your memory by increasing the supply of oxygen to your brain. 
3. Eat healthy food: Eating a balanced and healthy diet can provide your body and brain with the necessary nutrients and vitamins to support memory and concentration. 
4. Set realistic goals: By setting short-term, achievable goals, you can set yourself up for success and keep your concentration levels high.
5. Practice meditation: Taking time to meditate and to be mindful can help to clear your mind, reduce stress, and improve focus. 
6. Break up tasks: When tackling tasks, break them up into smaller steps that are easier to remember and focus on.

instruction: Give an example of a data mining problem that consists of open-ended generation.
output: An example of a data mining problem consisting of open-ended generation is text summarization. Using techniques such as machine learning and natural language processing, a text summarization system can automatically create summaries of long text documents by extracting the important facts and ideas and condensing them into a shorter, more readable version.

instruction: Khush naseeb hukmaran, badnaseeb awaam
output:
Pehla harf sochna, likhna aur kehna kis qadar mushkil hai. Soch ki aaghosh se nikla harf hurmat ki meezan le kar paida hota hai. Harf qalam se nikalta hai aur soch zehan o dil se aur dil ka mukalama lafz hai, harf hai.

Qalam ki qasam harf ki ahmiyat ko barha deti hai so mamooli si laghzish mehrem ko mujrim aur mujrim ko mehrem bana deti hai. Waqt ka taqaza hai ke sach likha jaye kyun ke halaat ghair mamooli hain, muamlaat qabil-e-feham magar na qabil-e-tehreer.

Watan azeez ko maali, maashi azadi to kabhi na mili magar ab maashi ghulami ki jin zanjeeron mein hum jakre ja chuke hain us ka zimmedar kaun hai? Sawal talkh hai aur haqaiq se awaam ko aagah karna zaroori.

Soviet Union kaise toota aur Afghanistan mojooda surat-e-haal mein kaise pohancha, Iran ki iqtisadiyat ko zak kis ne pohanchai jabke Bangladesh taraqqi ki manazil kaise tay kar

instruction: Mujhe machine learning ke mutaliq kuch mashhoor Pakistaniyon ke naam batao jinhn ne is shoba mein kaam kiya hai.
output:
Ji bilkul, Pakistan ke bohat saare logon ne is shoba mein bohat kaam kiya hai. Chand mashhoor log yeh hain:
1. Mubarak Shah (Mubarak Shah)
Doctor Shah UCF (University of Central Florida) mein computer vision ke head hain aur un ka machine learning mein bohat kaam hai.
2. Fahad Shehbaz Khan
Doctor Fahad Khan MBZUAI mein professor hain aur unhon ne deep learning aur computer vision mein kaam kiya hua hai.
3. Salman Khan
Doctor Salman Khan MBZUAI mein professor hain aur unhon ne deep learning aur computer vision mein kaam kiya hua hai.

Wazeh ho ke yeh sirf chand naam hain warna bohat saare aur bhi log hain jinhn ne bohat acha kaam kiya hua hai.

instruction: Create a timeline of the events in the Revolutionary War.
output:
1775: Outbreak of fighting at Lexington and Concord, Declaration of the Causes and Necessity of Taking Up Arms by the Second Continental Congress 
1776: Declaration of Independence, Battle of Long Island 
1777: Saratoga, Battle of Brandywine, Battle of Philadelphia 
1778: French Alliance, Battle of Monmouth 
1779: Siege of Savannah 
1780: Battle of Camden, Benedict Arnold's Treason 
1781: Yorktown, Treaty of Paris

instruction: Summarize the article about data privacy in under 50 words.
input: [Input: Link to article about data privacy]
output: Data privacy is becoming increasingly important in the digital age, as companies and governments collect, use, and store personal data. instruction: Present an argument for why writing a cover letter is important.
output: Writing a cover letter is an important step in the job application process as it gives employers a chance to learn more about the applicant. It can be used to demonstrate knowledge of the role, the company, and the industry, while also showcasing relevant skills and experiences. A good cover letter also provides a professional first impression, which can give an applicant a competitive edge over other job seekers.

instruction: Ilm ki noiyat aur ise kaise haasil kiya jata hai ke bare mein Aristotle ke khayalat kya hain?

Us ne ilm ko bhi mukhtalif aqsam mein taqseem kiya, jaise ke amali ilm aur nazariati ilm.

instruction: Develop an algorithm that can efficiently search for a given keyword in a list of items
input:
List of items: [macaroni, apple, banana, parsley, tomato]
Keyword: apple
output: A simple algorithm for searching for the keyword “apple” in the given list of items would be to traverse the list of items one by one and compare the item with the keyword. If the item matches the keyword, the algorithm returns the item and terminates the search. If the item does not match the keyword, the algorithm moves on to the next item. If the list of items is long, a more efficient algorithm such as binary search should be used.

instruction: Australia ka darul hukumat kya hai?
output:
Australia ke darul hukumat ke bare mein aksar abhaam paida hota hai kyun ke Sydney aur Melbourne mulk ke do mashhoor aur abadi walay shehar hain. Taham, na to Sydney aur na hi Melbourne Australia ka darul hukumat hai.
Canberra ko khaas tor par 1913 mein Australia ke darul hukumat ke tor par muntakhib kiya gaya tha kyun ke yeh Sydney aur Melbourne ke darmiyan waqeh tha, is tarah yeh do mumtaz shehron ke darmiyan aik samjhauta ke tor par kaam kar raha tha. Yeh faisla darul hukumat ki haisiyat ke liye baray shehron ke darmiyan kisi qisam ki dushmani ko rokne aur aik ghair janibdar aur maqsad ke mutabiq darul hukumat ke qayam ke liye kiya gaya tha.

Jabke Sydney aur Melbourne baray saqaafati aur iqtisadi markaz hain, Canberra mulk ke intizami aur siyasi darul hukumat ke tor par kaam karta hai, jahan ahem sarkari idaron jese ke Australian Parliament House rehaish pazeer hai. Yeh anokha intizam un logon ke liye kuch uljhanon ka bais ban sakta hai jo Australia ke dar

instruction: Misr ke dar ul hukoomat Qahira ke bare mein kuch batain.
output: Qahira Misr ka dar ul hukoomat aur Africa, Arab duniya aur Mashriq Wusta mein sab se bara shehri majmua hai. Qahira Kobra Metropolitan ilaqa, jis ki abadi 21.9 million hai, abadi ke lihaz se duniya ka barahwan bara mega shehar hai. Qahira ka talluq qadeem Misr se hai, kyun ke Ahramat Giza aur qadeem shehar Memphis aur Ain Shams is ke jughrafiyai ilaqe mein waqeh hain. Nile Delta ke qareeb waqeh, shehar sab se pehle Fustat ke tor par abad hua, aik basti jis ki bunyad Musalmanon ki fatah Misr ke baad 640 mein aik mojooda qadeem Romi qila, Babylon ke sath rakhi gayi thi. Dolat Fatimiyah ke taht 969 mein qareeb hi aik naye shehar al-Qahira ki bunyad rakhi gayi. Is ne baad mein Ayyubi Saltanat aur Saltanat Mamluk (Misr) adwar (barhwin-solhwin sadi) ke douran mein Fustat ko markazi shehri markaz ke tor par peeche chor diya

instruction: Bangladesh ki azadi ki jang kaise shuru hui, aur Mukti Bahini ne is tanazay mein kya kirdar ada kiya?
output: 1971 ki Bangladesh ki azadi ki jang Mashriqi Pakistan mein dareena siyasi, iqtisadi aur saqaafati shikayaat ke pas manzar mein samne aayi. Yeh tanaza 25 March 1971 ko Bengali qaum paraston ke khilaf Pakistani fauj ke wahshiyana crack down ke sath shuru hua. Is waqia ne jang-e-azadi ki shuruat ki, jis ke douran Mukti Bahini, Bengali fauji ahalkaroon aur aam shehrion par mushtamil aik force ne aham kirdar ada kiya. Mukti Bahini ne fa'aal tor par Pakistani afwaj ke khilaf muzahimat ki aur guerrilla jangi hikmat-e-amliyon mein masroof rahe. Unhon ne muqami abadi ke taawun se kaam kiya, qabze ke khilaf majmooi muzahimat mein aham kirdar ada kiya. Joon joon tanaza barhta gaya, Bharat barah-e-raast is mein shamil ho gaya, Mukti Bahini ko madad faraham ki aur bil aakhir aik mukammal Hind-Pakistan jang ka bais bani. Mukti

instruction: Provide a recipe for creating a chocolate cake in Urdu Languge.
output:
Ji zaroor, main aapko Urdu zaban mein chocolate cake banana zaroor sikhaoon ga.
Zaroori ashya:
- do cup maida
- 1 3/4 cup pisi hui cheeni
- 3/4 cup cocoa powder
- 1 1/2 khanay ke chamach baking powder
- 1 1/2 khanay ke chamach baking soda
- 1 khanay ka chamach namak
- 2 anday
- 1 cup doodh
- aadha (1/2) cup tail
- 2 khanay ke chamach vanilla (vinilla) extract
- 1 cup ubalta hua pani

Tarkeeb:
Oven ko pre-heat kar len 350°F (175°C) par.
Aik baray pyaale mein cheeni, maida, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, aur namak daal kar achi tarah mix kar len.
Anday, doodh, tail, aur vanilla ko bhi is mein daal kar beater mein beat karein 2 minute ke liye.
Is mein ubalta hua pani daalein aur mix karein.
Cake pan mein is tayar shuda batter ko daal dein.
Pehle se garam shuda oven mein 30 se 35

instruction: Explain what is the principle behind the electrical circuit.
output: The principle behind an electrical circuit is that electrical energy is transferred through a closed circuit, from a source of power (such as a battery) to a device that receives electrical energy (such as a light bulb). The electricity flows from the source of power through conductors such as wires and components such as resistors and switches, and then back to the source of power.

instruction: Main apne YouTube channel par tech mein khawateen ko aik muazne ki dawat deta hoon jahan woh apne safar ki baatein karein gi. Main un ke liye aik sawal nama tayyar karna chahta hoon, kaun se sawalat mein un se poochun taake un ke jawabaat naujawan larkiyon ko hosla dein ke woh tech mein apna rasta bana sakti hain.
output:
Yahan kuch sawalat diye gaye hain jo aap technology mein khawateen se pooch sakte hain taake naujawan larkiyon ko mehwu karein aur unhein targeeb dein ke woh technology ki field mein career banayein:

1. Kya aap ko technology ki sanat mein aap ka safar mukhtasar tareeqay se bayan kar sakti hain, jis mein aap ne kisi mushkil ka samna kiya aur unhein kaise paar kiya?
2. Technology ke shobay mein ibtidaai tor par aap ko kya kashish karta tha, aur aap ne is ke liye apne jazbe ko kaise daryaft kiya?
3. Kya aap ke career ke safar mein koi mukhasis misaalein ya mentors rahe hain jinhnon ne aap ko apne technology ke safar mein rehnumai di, agar

instruction:
Is sawal ka jawab likhein.
z-5 = 6
Is sawal mein z ki kya value hai? Har cheez soch kar hal karein
output:
Mein is sawal ko soch samajh kar hal karun ga. Yeh qadam ba qadam tareeqa hai hal karne ka:
Pehla step:
Hum agar sawal ko samjhein to humein pata chalta hai ke hum ne z ki value ko dhoondna hai.
Dosra step:
Hum log z ko aik side par akela karein ge, abhi z ke sath -5 hai.
To yeh tabdeel ho jae ga z = 6 + 5 mein
Teesra step:
Hum log doosri side ka jawab nikaalein ge jo ke 11 hai. Jis se humein pata chalta hai ke
z = 11

instruction: Chandrayaan 3 ka budget kai Hollywood filmon se bhi kam hai?
output:
Bharat ke khalaai mission Chandrayaan 3 ne do roz qabl chaand par utar kar tareekh raqam kar di jis ke baad is ke budget ke hawale se khabrein gardish kar rahi hain.

Padosi mulk Bharat ne do roz qabl chaand par qadam rakh diya aur is ke bheje gaye khalaai mission Chandrayaan 3 ne kamyabi se chaand ke junubi qutub mein landing kar ke tareekh raqam kar di taham is tareekh saaz mauqa ke saath hi Chandrayaan se judi kai khabrein media ki zeenat ban rahi hain, jaisa ke social media par yeh khabar viral ho rahi hai ke Chandrayaan ka budget Hollywood ki khala se mutaliq banai gai kai filmon se bhi kam hai.

Social media platform X (saabiq Twitter) par 'News Think' nami page ne post karte hue is janib tawajjo dilai ke Bharat ka yeh mission Hollywood ki kai filmon ke muqablay mein bohat sasta hai, balkay is project par kaam karne wale scientiston ki tankhwain filmi sitaron se kai guna kam hain.

Unhon ne post karte hue mazeed likha ke aap ko yeh jaan kar hairani

instruction: Chup shoroo banane ki tarkeeb
output: Dono qisam ka aata mila kar is mein namak, cheeni aur khushk khameer daalein aur isay neem garam pani se narm goondh lein. Dhak kar garam jagah par bees se pachees minute ke liye rakh dein. Aik piyaz ko dahi ke saath pees lein aur is mein namak, laal mirch aur haldi mila kar saaf dhuli hui chanpon ko achi tarah marinate karke rakh dein do se teen khanay ke chamach cooking oil mein aik bareek kati hui piyaz ko halki sunehri fry karein aur is mein marinate kiye chanpon ko daal kar halki aanch par dhak kar pakne rakh dein. Chanp ka pani khushk ho jaye aur woh mukammal tor par gal jaye to unhein achi tarah bhoon kar choolhay se utaar lein. Gandhay huay aatay ko dobara se goondh kar chhotay chhotay pairay bana lein aur halkay haath se lambay naan bail lein. Garam taway par unhein pita bread ki tarah halka sa seenk lein, phir aik naan par teen se chaar chanp rakh kar isay doosray

instruction: Do kisaan, Laili o Max, da asrar cheez pa bare mein bayanat karte hain. Laili kehti hai, "Max jhoot bolta hai." Max kehta hai, "Asrar aitraaz aik kitaab hai." Kaun sach bolta hai?
output: Max sach bolta hai. Agar Laili sach bolti hai, to Max ko kitaab ke bare mein aitraaz ke bare mein jhoot bolna chahiye. Magar yeh Laili ka bayan ghalat kar dega, jo ke tazad ka sabab banta hai. Is liye, Max sach bolta hai.

instruction: Mamaliya / mammals par mazmoon likhein
output:
Mamaliya ya pastaniya (Angrezi: mammals) aisay jandaron ko kaha jata hai ke jo faqariya hotay hain aur un ke madah shareek mein pastan paye jatay hain jis se woh apne bachon ko doodh pilatay hain neez un mein aur parindon aur reengnay walay janwaron mein balon aur chaar khanon walay dil aur kaan ki darmiyani haddi ka bhi farq hota hai is groh se talluq rakhne walay jandar ke dimaagh ka aik khaas hissa hota hai jo jism ke darja hararat ko qaboo rakhta hai. Isi pastan ke rakhne ki khasoosiyat ki wajah se un ko pastaniya bhi kaha jata hai jabke is ki jama pastaniye ki jati hai. Angrezi mein mammalia ke liye munasib Urdu mutabadil, pastaniyan aata hai.

In mein zyada tar hewanat sabzi khor Herbivorus hotay hain, kuch gosht khor Carnivores aur kuch humma khor Omnivores hotay hain. Yeh garam khoon ke hewan Homoethermic hain.

Hawala jat
^ a b p mukammal kaam yahan dastiyab hai: http://www.mapress.com/zoot

instruction: List three types of food that are high in calcium.
output: Foods high in calcium include dairy products such as milk, yogurt, and cheese; fortified plant-based milks such as almond milk or oat milk; canned fish with bones such as salmon or sardines; green leafy vegetables such as spinach or kale; and nuts and seeds such as almonds and sesame seeds.

instruction: Create a script that a customer service representative may use when responding to a customer issue.
input: Customer says: My order is taking too long to arrive.
output:

instruction: Summarize the historical events underlying the current immigration debate
output:
The immigration debate is rooted in historical events such as the Chinese Exclusion Act of 1882 and the Immigration and Nationality Act of 1965. The former was designed to limit the number of Chinese immigrants entering the United States and was the first law to specifically deport immigrants. The latter, also known as the Hart-Celler Act, abolished the national origins quota system that favored immigration from Europe and set up a new immigration system based on reuniting immigrant families and attracting skilled labor.

8. Output:
Technology has had a profoundly positive effect on daily life. It has increased productivity and given increased access to information, products and services. As a result, it has enabled people to save time and money them to focus on other activities, such as socializing and other leisure activities. Technology has opened up new markets and new ways of doing business and has dramatically reduced communication distances by making communication almost instantaneous.

output: Jawab: sarmaya daari aamdani mein adam masawaat mein hissa daal sakti hai, kyun ke afraad aur karobar jo daulat jama karte hain un ke paas sarmaya kaari aur taraqqi ke zyada moqaay hotay hain. instruction: Data science kya hai?
output: Data science aik shumariyati ilm hai jo computer science, machine learning, aur dusre takhasusat ka majmua hai taake adadi aur mawadi maloomat ko tajziya kiya ja sake aur un se feham hasil ki ja sake. Data science ka istemal mukhtalif shu'bon mein jaise ke business, sehat, tijarat, social media, aur bohat saare dusre shu'bon mein kiya jata hai taake tasmeemat ko behtar banaya ja sake aur nai maloomat ka akatha kiya ja sake.

instruction: Ragsi kabab banane ki tarkeeb
output: Andon ko ubal kar lambai ke rukh par darmiyan se kaatain aur ehtiyaat se zardi nikaal lain. Matar aur gajar ko ubal kar halka sa mash kar lain aur is mein namak, aik bareek kati hui hari mirch aur aik khanay ka chamach hara dhania mila lain. Qeemay mein aik pyaaz, aik chai ka chamach adrak lehsan, anday ki zardiyan, hari mirchain aur hara dhania mila kar bareek pees lain. Katay huay andon ke darmiyan mein sabziyon ka mixture bhar kar achi tarah daba kar band kar dain, phir is par pisa hua qeema lapait dain. Pan mein teen se chaar khanay ke chamach cooking oil mein pyaaz ko sunehri fry karain aur is mein namak, adrak lehsan, laal mirchain, haldi, dhania, zeera aur dahi daal kar achi tarah bhonain. Jab tail alehda ho jaye to achi tarah bhon kar is mein tayar kiye huay kabab daal kar aadhi piyali pani daal dain. Jab kababon ki rangat tabdeel ho jaye to is ko halka sa bhon kar hara dh

instruction: Allama Iqbal ke koi mashhoor ash'aar likhein.
output:
Allama Iqbal aik maroof shair, musannif, qanoon daan, siyasatdan aur Tehreek Pakistan ki ahem tareen shakhsiyat mein se aik the. Unki chand mashhoor ash'aar yeh hain:
1. Khudi ko kar buland itna ke har taqdeer se pehle
Khuda bande se khud pooche bata teri raza kya hai
2. Tere ishq ki inteha chahta hoon
Meri sadgi dekh kya chahta hoon
3. Hazaron saal nargis apni be-noori pe roti hai
Bari mushkil se hota hai chaman mein deeda-war paida
4. Sitaron se aage jahan aur bhi hain
Abhi ishq ke imtihaan aur bhi hain

In ash'aar ke ilawa bhi Allama Iqbal ke bohat saare ash'aar hain jin ko aap parh saktay hain.

output: Yeh sawal ilm ke mutalea se mutaliq ilmi ilm mein shamil hai. Falsafiyana shukoq o shubhaat baaz ilm ke imkaan ko challenge karta hai, is baat par zor deta hai ke tamam aqayed shak ke tabe hain.
