instruction: Kofta Flowers banane ki tarkeeb batain
output: Qeemay ko saaf dho kar chhalni mein rakh lein, achi tarah khushk ho jaye to is mein adrak lehsan, namak aur dahi mila kar rakh dein. Pan mein aik se do khanay ke chamach cooking oil mein chop ki hui pyaaz ko halka sa narm honay tak fry karein. Phir is mein laal mirch, bhuna kata dhania zeera aur kati hui hari mirchein daal kar halka sa fry karein aur is mein yakhni daal kar ubaal anay dein. Ubaal anay par is mein qeema daal kar halki aanch par dhak dein. Jab qeema ka pani khushk honay par ajaye to is mein corn flour chirak lein taake qeema aapas mein chipakta sa ho jaye. Choolhay se utaar kar is mein ajwain chirak kar thanda kar lein. Samosay ki chookor pattiyaan lein aur har patti mein qeema ko aik gol chamach mein le kar doosray chamach ki madad se koftay ki shakal mein patti ke darmiyan mein rakh dein. Anday ki safedi ko qeema ke kinaron par lagayen aur samosay ki patti ko charon taraf se u

instruction: Summarize the main themes of this novel in 3 sentences.
input: Harry Potter and the Philosopher’s Stone
output: Harry Potter and the Philosopher’s Stone tells the story of a young wizard's journey to becoming the Boy Who Lived. Along the way, he discovers that courage and friendship are the keys to overcoming evil and embracing a world of possibilities. This novel focuses on themes of family, loyalty, and acceptance, ultimately illustrating the power of the human spirit.

instruction: Fatah se aage: Ahmad Shah Abdali ke Maratha sarzameen par baar baar hamle karne walay bunyadi muharrikat aur azaim kya thay?
output: Maratha Saltanat par Ahmad Shah Abdali ke teen hamlay (1752-1761) Hindustani tareekh ka aik ahem bab hain, jo saada bayaniyon se hat kar ahem muharrikat ko zahir karte hain. Agarche ilaqai tosee aur mazhabi josh ko aksar bunyadi maqasid ke tor par pesh kiya jata hai, lekin gehrai se talash karne se mutaadid muharrikat ka pata chalta hai. Abdali ki Saltanat, Durrani Saltanat, siyasi aur iqtisadi mufadat se chalti thi, jo iqtisadi asar o rasookh ko barhane aur ahem tijarati raaston ko mehfooz banane ki koshish karti thi. Marathaon ne, jo wasti Hindustan ko control kar rahe thay, is tosee mein kafi rukaawat khari ki. Mazeed baran, androoni Maratha siyasat, jo khud mukhtar riyasaton ke darmiyan dushmaniyon aur taqat ki kashmakash se nishan zad thi, ne Abdali ko istihsal ke moqaay faraham kiye thay. Sunni Muslim D

instruction: Urdu mein kahani sunaiye:
output:
Dopehar ka waqt tha. Barish ke sabab khunki khunki hawa chal rahi thi. Ammi ne Salman ko bazar se sabzi lene ka kaha to woh koodta hua apni cycle par bazar ki taraf rawana ho gaya. Salman waliden ka farmanbardar aur bohat moazzab beta tha. Ammi ya Abu ke munh se nikle har hukum ko man o an poora karta tha. Bazar jate hue raste mein Salman cycle chalate chalate thak gaya to kuch der sustane ke liye woh cycle khari kar ke aik darakht ke neeche bench par baith gaya.
Achanak us ki nazar us purane purse par pari jo qadre behtar haalat mein para tha. Salman sochne laga ke yeh purse utha leta hoon ghar ja kar chhoti behan Maryam ko doon ga. Woh kai baar Ammi se purse lene ka keh chuki thi. Salman ne purse ko uthaya phoonk maari aur gard o ghubar saaf karte hue jab purse khola to haka baka reh gaya.
Is purse mein sone ka haar aur bohat sari jewellery mojood thi. Woh bohat khush ho gaya magar us ke zehan mein zimmedari ka ehsas paida hua aur kuch der sochne ke baad us ne purse ma

instruction: Asr-e-haazir ki Pashtun siyasat mein Abdul Samad Khan Achakzai ki virasat ki kya ahmiyat hai?
output: Abdul Samad Khan Achakzai ki virasat asri Pashtun siyasat mein numayan hai kyun ke unhon ne Pashtun qaum parast tehreek ki bunyaad rakhi aur Pashtun awam ke siyasi shuoor mein apna hissa dala. Jamhuriyat, khud-mukhtari, aur Pashtun baradari ke huqooq par un ka zor khitte mein siyasi guftagu ko mutasir karta hai. Pashtunkhwa Milli Awami Party, jis ki unhon ne bunyaad rakhi, Pakistan mein Pashtunon ke huqooq aur jamhoori usoolon ki wakalat karne wali aik fa'aal siyasi quwat hai. Achakzai ke nazariyat aur khidmaat ko Pashtun awam ke huqooq aur shanakht ke liye jari jadd-o-jehd ke liye lazmi tor par yaad kiya jata hai.

instruction: Kya Bangladesh mein Urdu boli jati hai?
output:
1971 tak Bangladesh Pakistan ka hissa tha aur is ki pehchaan Mashriqi Pakistan ke tor par thi. Urdu ko yahan ki muqami Bengali zaban ki tarah sarkari himayat hasil thi. Taham 1971 ke baad ke waqiat jin ke baad jab yeh mulk wujood mein aaya, Urdu zaban ko yahan ki pehchaan se mutasadim samjha gaya aur yahan ki Bihari abadi jo Urdu go hai, ghair shehri samjha gaya. Maujooda daur mein Urdu daan abadi ki tadaad chaar laakh batayi gayi hai.[1]

Azadi ke baad Urdu taleem ki masdoodi
1971 ke fori baad schooli satah par Urdu taleem amalan khatam ho gayi. College ki satah par yeh silsila 2002 mein khatam hua kyun ke Urdu ke ustad dast yaab nahi the. Taham deeni madaris mein Urdu ki parhai aaj bhi jari rahi.[1]

Adab o saqafat se Urdu ki doori
Bangladesh mein guzishta chaar paanch dehayon se kahin bhi koi Urdu drama paish nahi kiya gaya aur na hi Urdu tamseel nigari koi

Aik pyaale mein tamam ajzae tarkeebi baaham yakja karein. Unhein bakhoobi mix karein. Aik pan mein tamam ajzae tarkeebi baaham yakja karein. Un mein cup pani shamil karein. 4 Unhein dheemi aanch par 5 ta 10 minute tak pakayein. 5 Pakanay ke baad mukammal tor par thanda karein. instruction: Design a device that can process requests from natural language
output: The device should consist of several components. First, a speech recognition system will convert audio from the user into text. Then, a natural language processing (NLP) system will analyze this text and determine its meaning. Once the intent is determined, the device can access a database of information or applications related to the request, analyze the data, and provide a response. Finally, a text-to-speech system will convert the response into an audio signal.

instruction: Shadi ke bare mein aik gana likhein
output:
Shadi ki bastiyon mein, rangeen sajain har taraf,
dilon ki dastanain, khushiyon se bharein har jagah.
Mohabbat ki nai kahani, naik bandhanon ki kahani,
ye rishta pyar ka, hamari zindagi ki kahani.

Shadi ki misaaq hai pyar ki aik nai shuruat,
do jismanein aik dil ki dhadkan ke sath.
Hum aik hotay hain aik dosray ki sathi,
shadi ki rahon mein, khushiyon ki chaaon barsati.

Milnay ki aik khwahish, poori hoti hai aaj,
rishton ki aik nai kahani, banti hai pyar ki baat.
Sajnay lagti hain dil ki doriyaan, pal pal ke sath,
do jismanein, aik dil ki dhadkan ke sath.

Shadi ki misaaq hai pyar ki aik nai shuruat,
do jismanein aik dil ki dhadkan ke sath.
Hum aik hotay hain aik dosray ki sathi,
shadi ki rahon mein, khushiyon ki chaaon barsati.

Mohabbat ki pairwi, jiyo palon ko khushiyon ke sath,
hamari dil ki roshni, har din barhti rahe barsati

instruction: Cheen ki taseer aur Afghanistan ke siyasi manazir: kya is silsle mein Pakistan ka kirdar bhi mehsoos ho raha hai?
output:
Afghanistan mein tanbe aur lohe ki kanon mein sarmaya kari karta raha hai. Woh One Belt One Road scheme ke taht bohat saare mumalik par apna asar o rasookh barha raha hai.

Isi ke saath Cheen-Pakistan aur Taliban-Pakistan ki qurbat bhi wazeh hai. Aisi soorat-e-haal mein Cheen Pakistan ki madad se Taliban ke saath qurbat barha sakta hai jo India ke liye bara challenge ban hoga.

Ashok Sajjanhar bhi is se kisi had tak mutafiq hain. Un ka kehna hai ke 'Cheen yaqeenan Afghanistan mein aik khilari hoga. Naye nizaam mein woh bhi Afghanistan mein apna asar o rasookh barhane ki koshish karega. Cheen ne maazi mein wahan sarmaya kari ki hai lekin wahan zyada kaam nahi kar saka hai. Jabke India ne zameeni satah par kaam kiya hai. India doosre mulk ki fikr kiye baghair apni taqat par kaam karega.'

Pakistan ke bare mein baat karte hue Ashok Sajjanhar ka kehna hai ke agar Taliban bil

instruction: Kya aap "achay shehri" par Urdu mein mazmoon likh sakte hain?
output:
Aik acha shehri
Lafz ‘shehri’ jamhooriyat mein sab se zyada istemal hone wala lafz hai. Siyasat ke liye har satah par istemal hota hai. Shehri woh shakhs hota hai jo huqooq se lutf andoz hota hai aur riyasat mein apne farz sar anjam deta hai. Hindustan mein rehne wala har Hindustani shehri nahi hai. Hindustan mein rehna kisi shakhs ko shehri nahi banata. Aik shehri woh hota hai jo riyasat ka member ho aur hukoomat banane ke amal mein hissa leta ho. Woh shakhs jis ke qawaneen ke taht hukmarani ho lekin us ke paas koi siyasi huqooq nahi ho woh shehri nahi hai.

Shehri ki istilah jamhooriyat ke urooj ke saath judi hui hai. Jahan kisi ko siyasi huqooq, vote dalne ka haq aur aham sawalat par faisla lene mein hissa lene ka haq hai woh shehri hai. 1789 mein Fransisi inqilab ke baad lafz ’shehri‘ lafz maqbool hua. Kaha gaya ke “tamam she

instruction:
4x−7(2−x) = 3 x + 2
Is linear equation mein se x ka jawab nikaalein. Har qadam par sochein
output:
Theek hai, mein is linear equation ka har qadam par soch kar jawab nikaaloon ga.

Pehla qadam:
Hum sab se pehle brackets yani qosein ko hal karein ge. Qosein mein humare paas -7(2-x) hai jo ke -14 + 7x ke barabar hai.
Lehazaa humare paas yeh bachta hai: 4x - 14 + 7x = 3x + 2
Ab hum -14 ko doosri side aur 3x ko pehli side par le aayenge
4x + 7x - 3x = 2 + 14
Dosra qadam:
Dono sides ko aik akeli value mein le aayenge.
11x - 3x = 16
8x = 16
Teesra qadam:
Ab hum x ko bilkul akela kar denge.
x = 16 / 8
x = 2
Gharz humara jawab x = 2 hai

Test:
Hum apni asli sawal mein x ki value daal kar dekhein ge ke kya yeh durust hai?
Pehla qadam:
4x−

instruction:
"Sitaron se sargoshi karte hue, mujhe kainati shaan o shaukat mein sukoon mila."

Mundarja bala bayan kis taraf ishaara kar raha hai?
output:
Bayan ka mafhoom: Bayan isti'arati tor par kainat ki wusat se jud kar sukoon talash karne ke zaati tajurbe ko bayan karta hai, jis ki alamat sitaron se sargoshi karte hain.

Jawab: Yeh ghair mamooli bayan khud shanasi aur kainat ke sath talluq ka ehsas dilata hai. Yeh sitaron ke sath baat cheet karke sukoon hasil karne ke speaker ke amal ki tasweer kashi karta hai, jo insani jazbat aur kainati wusat ke darmiyan gehra talluq tajweez karta hai. "Sitaron ki taraf sargoshi" ka isti'arati amal kainat ke sath rabte ki aik shakal par dalalat karta hai, jahan khala ki wusat aur asrar ghour o fikr aur khud aksai ke liye aik aaram deh aur pur sukoon pas-e-manzar faraham karta hai. Yeh bayan khala ki hairat angaiz nature aur kainat ki shaan o shaukat mein sukoon aur maani talash karne ki salahiyat ko hasil karta hai.

instruction: NASA ke James Webb Space Telescope aur European Space Agency ke Plato mission jaise jari khalaai mission hamare nizaam shamsi ki tashkeel aur irtiqa ke tanazur mein kharji nizaamon aur un ki mutabiqat ke bare mein hamari samajh mein kis tarah taawun karte hain?
output: Jawab: Jari khalaai mission, khas tor par James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) ka ainda launch aur Plato mission, ahem koshishon ki numaindagi karte hain jin ka maqsad kharji sayyare nizaamon ke bare mein hamari samajh ko aage barhana hai. JWST, aurqat tool mouj mein kainaat ka mushahida karne ke liye design kiya gaya hai, mahol aur kharji sayyare ke murakkabat ke bare mein be-misal baseerat faraham karega. Yeh maloomat sayyaron ke nizaam ke tanawwo ko samajhne aur yeh samajhne ke liye zaroori hai ke woh hamare apne nizaam shamsi se kaise muwazna karte hain. Plato mission, jo kharji sayyare ko daryaft karne aur un ki khusoosiyat par tawajjo markooz karta hai, mumkin tor par qabil rehaysh

instruction: Mustadam sayahat ki tarweej ke liye aik hal ya tajawiz faraham karein
output:
Mustadam sayahat ki tarweej ke liye aik hal ya tajawiz faraham karne ka aik tareeqa hai ke aik tasdeeqi nizaam ko amal mein laya jaye jo karobar aur maqamat ki tashheer karta hai jo mustadam usoolon ka pairovi karte hain aur unhein farogh deta hai. Is tasdeeqi nizaam ki tasdeeq ko eco labels ya dusri industries mein istemal ki jane wali sabz tasdeeqaon ki tarah kiya ja sakta hai.

Is tasdeeqi nizaam ke taht sayahat ke mukhtalif pehluon ki tashheer ki jaye gi, jaise ke tawanai aur pani ki mehfoozgi, kachra intizam, nai tajdeed pazeer wasail ka istemal, muqami community ki shirkat, aur saqaafati hifazat. Woh karobar aur maqamat jo mayaron ko poora karte hain, unhein tasdeeq di jaye gi, jo ke un ki websites, signage, aur tasheeri mawaad mein numayan tareeqay se dikhaya ja sakta hai.

Sayyahoon, safri agencies, aur online booking platforms ke darmiyan sharakaton

instruction: Explain the core concepts of Machine Learning to an audiences consisting of a layman.
output: Machine Learning is a type of artificial intelligence (AI) that allows computers to learn and make predictions. It works by providing computers with data and algorithms which they can use to identify patterns in the data and then identify cause and effect relationships. This allows the computer to behave in a more 'intelligent' way, by making better predictions, or learning from experience. Machine Learning can be used in a variety of applications such as speech recognition, image recognition, recommendation systems, and natural language processing.

instruction: Compare and contrast the rise of the Soviet Union and the fall of the Iron Curtain.
output:
The rise of the Soviet Union and the fall of the Iron Curtain represent two major shifts in the geopolitical landscape of the twentieth century. 

The rise of the Soviet Union began in 1917, with the October Revolution and establishment of the Soviet state. The October Revolution overthrew the Tsarist Autocracy, setting the stage for a longer period of Marxist-Leninist rule in the USSR. During this time the Soviet government implemented numerous state-sponsored social and economic programs, drastically changing the political, economic, and social systems of the USSR. 

The fall of the Iron Curtain began in the late 1980s, with the collapse of the Soviet Union and the dissolution of the Warsaw Pact in 1989. This event marked the end of the Cold War and a radical shift in the international order. It signified the end of Soviet hegemony in Eastern Europe, and with it the end of the ideological and physical divisions between East and West put in place during the Cold War. 

The two events had a significant impact on the global geopolitical balance, with the rise of the Soviet Union representing a major shift in the international order and the fall of the Iron Curtain marking a decisive end to the Cold War and a transition to a new era of international relationship.

instruction: Zaban ko qoum ki shanakht ka bunyadi ansar kyun samjha jata hai?
output: Zaban qoumi shanakht ka sang-e-bunyad hai, jo saqaafati virsay, tareekh aur mushtarka aqdar ke taqatwar izhar ke tor par kaam karti hai. Yeh communities ko aapas mein jorta hai, muwaslat ka aik mushtarka zariya faraham karta hai jo shehrion ke darmiyan talluq ke ehsas ko farogh deta hai. Kisi qoum ki zaban mein shamil munfarid lisani khususiyaat, mahawaray aur ta'asuraat is ki alag saqaafati shanakht mein hissa dalte hain, jis tarah se log khud ko aur un ki mushtarka tareekh ko samajhte hain. Ittehad ki alamat ke tor par, zaban ijtimai qoumi shu'oor aur fakhr ko farogh dene mein ahem kirdar ada karti hai.

Zaban qoumi shanakht ka sang-e-bunyad hai, jo saqaafati virsay, tareekh aur mushtarka aqdar ke taqatwar izhar ke tor par kaam karti hai. Yeh communities ko aapas mein jorta hai, muwaslat ka aik mushtarka zariya faraham karta hai jo shehrion ke darmiyan talluq ke ehsas ko farogh deta hai. Kisi qoum ki zaban mein shamil munfarid lisani khususiyaat, mahawaray aur ta'asuraat is ki alag saqaafati shanakht mein hissa dalte hain, jis tarah se log khud ko aur un ki mushtarka tareekh ko samajhte hain. Ittehad ki alamat ke tor par, zaban ijtimai qoumi shu'oor aur fakhr ko farogh dene mein ahem kirdar ada karti hai.

instruction: Design a school uniform.
output: A school uniform should include a collared blouse, a pleated skirt of navy color, and a V-neck cardigan or sweater. For footwear, students should wear dark colored shoes or loafers. A school hat or cap would also be appropriate.

instruction: Discuss the relationship between entropy and reversibility.
output: Entropy is a measure of disorder in a system. It is a measure of the amount of energy that is unavailable to do work. Reversibility is the ability of a system to return to its original state after it has undergone some change. A reversible system is one in which the entropy of the system can be completely restored to its original state after undergoing a change. Entropy and reversibility are related in that a system with a lower entropy is more likely to be reversible.

instruction: Punjab ki tareekh par Urdu mein paragraph likhein.
output: Punjab ki tareekh bohat wasee aur rangeen hai. Yeh ilaqa bohat se qadeem channelon ke taqatu par waqeh hai jis ke bais yahan ki tareekh bohat taweel aur motanaw hai. Punjab ki tareekh Pakistan aur Hindustan ki tareekh ka aham hissa hai. Is khubsurat khittay ne taleem, sanat, adab aur saqafat ke taraqqi mein aham kirdar ada kiya hai.. Qadeem zamane se hi Punjab mein Hindu, Musalman, Sikh aur dusre mazhab ke log rehte aaye hain jis ki bunyaad par yahan ki tareekh mazhabi, saqafati aur zabani riwayaat se bharpoor hai. Is ilaqay ne Mughalon, Sikhon, Afghanon aur Bartaniyon ke qabze mein raha hai aur in tamam mumalik ki tasuraat ne is ki saqafat par asar kiya hai. Punjab ki tareekh ne is ko motanaw, romanwi aur rangeen banaya hai jo is ki khususiyaaton ko anokha aur numayan banati hai.

instruction: Ziabetes se bachao ke liye kya ehtiyaat karein?
output:
Ziabetes ko khamosh qaatil kaha jata hai, pachees fi sad afraad ko ilm nahi hota ke woh is marz ka shikar ho chuke hain, Pakistan mein sugar ke mareezon ki tadaad 3 lakh 3 crore se zyada ho chuki hai, har choutha Pakistani naujawan ziabetes ka shikar hai.

Baaz logon mein yeh ghalat fehmi bhi payi jati hai ke jab un mein ziabetes ki tashkhees hoti hai to woh samajhte hain ke parhez ke hawale se yeh sirf refined safed cheeni ka maamla hai, chanan che woh cheeni kam kar ke is ka badal lene lagte hain jaisa ke brown sugar aur gurh waghera, un ka yeh khayaal hota hai ke yeh nuqsan deh nahi hai.

Jin logon ki family history hai woh to ziabetes ke shadeed khatre se dochar hain hi, lekin shehron mein hamara jo life style ban gaya hai, hatta ke gaon mein reh kar bhi hum log ab walk nahi karte, murghun ghizain khate hain aur carbohydrates ka istemaal zyada hai, is ki wajah se bhi mareezon ki tadaad barh rahi hai.

instruction: Burhan Wani shaheed ka mission ke baare mein humein mazeed batain
output: 8 July 2016 ko namaz e jumma ki adaiygi ke baad log gharon ko wapas ja rahe the. Eid ul Fitr ke baad kaafi chahal pehal thi. Matla abr alood tha. Is dauran aik khabar jungle ki aag ki tarah phail gayi. Junubi Kashmir ke sayahati maqam Kokernag ke Bamdoora gaon ka qabiz Bharti fauj aur police task force ne achanak crack down kar liya. Gaon ko muhasra mein le kar talashi operation shuru kiya. Aik rehaishi makan par andha dhund golabari ki. Kashmir mein Bharti fauj ke, muhasray, chhapay aur talashi operation 1990 se crack down ke naam se jane jate hain. Aaj tak Kashmir mein hazaron ki tadaad mein crack down ho chuke hain. Shayad hi koi ghar ho jo kai kai baar qabiz forces ke operation aur tor phor se bacha ho. Kokernag operation ka is liye charcha hua ke is ka nishana aik aisa mujahid naujawan aur us ka group tha, jis ne waadi mein musallah jidojehad ki pehchaan hi badal daali. Us

instruction: Kya Amazon ne apne pehle satellites madar mein bhej diye
output:
Amazon ke pehl2 satellite guzishta roz madar mein kamyabi se daakhil hogaye jo zameen ke nichle madar mein satellites ka network banane ke company ke mansoobay ka aaghaz hai.
Amazon ke satellite network project Kuiper ke Proto Flight Mission ko United Launch Alliance (ULA) Atlas V rocket ke zariye mashriqi waqt ke mutabiq jumma ki dopehar 2 baj kar 6 minute par Florida mein Cape Canaveral Space Force Station se rawana kiya gaya. Amazon ke satellites ke size aur design ke baare mein maloomat zaahir nahi ki gayi.

Proto Flight Launch ULA aur Amazon ke darmiyan wasee tijarati shirakat dari ka pehla mission hai jis ke tehat project Kuiper ki ziada tar satellites ko launch kiya jaega.

instruction: Adam Smith ka "Ikhlaqi Jazbat ka Nazriya" un ke maashi nazariyat ki takmeel kaise karta hai, aur insani fitrat aur ikhlaqiyat ke bare mein un ke khayalat kya the?
output: "Ikhlaqi Jazbat ka Nazriya" mein Adam Smith ne insani rawaiye aur ikhlaqi falsafay ki noiyat ki khoj ki. Us ne daleel di ke insanoon mein hamdardi ka aik fitri ehsas hota hai, jo unhein doosron ke jazbat ko samajhne aur un ka khayal rakhne ke qabil banata hai. Yeh ikhlaqi jazba, khudi ke sath mil kar, insani rawaiye par asar andaaz hota hai aur samaji hum ahangi mein hissa dalta hai. Smith ka khayal tha ke zaati mufad ka husool, jab ikhlaqi jazbat se rehnumai hasil ki jati hai, infiradi aur muashrati dono tarah ki bhalai ka bais ban sakti hai.

instruction: Lablaba par 300 alfaaz mein Urdu mein mukhtasar taqreer likhein.
output:
Lablaba sab se ahem hazma ghadood mein se aik hai. Jin ke khuliat lablabe ka ras kharij karte hain.

Yeh ghadood girahni ke loop mein waqeh hai. Isay is ki do naliyon (insan aur kuton mein) aur baaz auqat kai izafi naliyon se girahni mein khaali kiya jata hai.

Yeh bairooni aur andarooni dono ratoobat paida karne mein qabil-e-zikr hai. Ghadood ka bara hissa "racemose" ka dhancha hai jo thook ke ghadood se milta julta hai.

Akinar khuliay aik peripheral clear zone aur aik central zone dikhate hain jismain zymogen granules hotay hain jo khufia sargarmi ke douran lumen mein kharij hotay hain.

Ghadood ki markazi nali bile duct ke ampulla (Vater ka ampulla) par bile duct ke sath baat cheet karti hai aur Oddi ke sphincter ke zariye ratoobat ko girahni mein kharij karti hai.

Lablabe ke acinar tissue ke andar sarayat shuda cellular tissue ki aik nisbatan

instruction: Mujhe is ganay ke bol chahiye "Tu Jaane Na" jo Atif Aslam ki awaaz mein gaaye gaye hain
output:

Kaise batain kyun tujh ko chahein, yaara bata na paain
Baatain dilon ki, dekho jo baqi, aankhein tujhe samjhaain
Tu jaane na, tu jaane na

Mil ke bhi hum na mile tum se na jaane kyun
Meelon ke hain faasle tum se na jaane kyun
Anjanay hain silsilay tum se na jaane kyun
Sapnay hain palkon talay tum se na jaane kyun

Kaise batain kyun tujh ko chahein, yaara bata na paain

Woh hai milata tum se ho bahu
Woh jaane teri aankhein theen ya baatein theen wajah
Hue tum jo dil ke aarzu
Tum paas ho ke bhi, tum aas ho ke bhi
Ehsaas ho ke bhi apne nahi
Aisay hain
Hum ko galay tum se na jaane kyun

instruction: Write some sad poetry in Urdu
output:
Sure, here is some sad poetry in Urdu Language:
Jab se us ne shehar ko chhoda har rasta sunsan hua
Apna kiya hai saare shehar ka ik jaisa nuqsan hua
Yeh dil, yeh aaseb ki nagri, maskan sochon, wahmon ka
Soch raha hoon is nagri mein tu kab se mehmaan hua
Sehra ki munh zor hawaen auron se mansoob hueen
Muft mein hum aawara thehre muft mein ghar weraan hua
Mere haal pe hairat kaisi dard ke tanha mausam mein
Pathar bhi ro parte hain insaan to phir insaan hua
Itni der mein ujray dil par kitne mehshar beet gaye
Jitni der mein tujh ko pa kar khone ka imkaan hua
Kal tak jis ke gird tha raqsan ik anbooh sitaron ka
Aaj usi ko tanha pa kar main to bohat hairaan hua
Us ke zakhm chhupa kar rakhiye khud us shakhs ki nazron se
Us se kaisa shikwa kije woh to abhi nadan hua
Jin ashkon ki pheeki lo ko hum bekaar samajhte the
Un ashkon se kitna roshan ik tareek

instruction: Maidan-e-jang se aage: Marhaton ke saath Abdali ke tanaza'at ne junubi Asia ke wasee siyasi manzarnamay par kya asar dala?
output: Maratha-Durrani jango'n ne junubi Asia ke wasee siyasi manzar name ko numayan tor par mutasir kiya, jo ke mehaz ilaqai fatahat se aage barhtay hue. Agarche Abdali ne faisla kun tor par Marhaton ko shikast nahi di, lekin is ki fatahat ne un ki fouji aur siyasi taqat ko kafi nuqsan pohanchaya. Is ne wasti Hindustan mein Maratha asar ko kamzor kiya aur dusre ilaqai quwaton ke urooj mein sahulat faraham ki. Jango'n ne adam istihkam aur taqseem ko hawa di, jis se junubi Asia mein pehlay se hi naazuk siyasi manzar name mein mazeed izafa hua. Kamzor Marhaton ne taqat ka khala paida kiya, jis se ilaqai quwaton ke darmiyan musabiqat aur tanaza'at mein izafa hua. Abdali ki fatahat ne dusre hukmaranon ko Marhaton ko challenge karne ke liye hosla afzai ki aur is khittay mein aik paicheeda aur mutaharrik siyasi mahol mein hissa

instruction: Sikandar ki aamad ne junubi Asiai khitte aur is ke logon par kya asar dala?
output: Sikandar ki aamad ka junubi Asiai khitte par khaas asar pada. Is ki fouji muhim ke nateeje mein muqami hukmaranon ke saath kai badi jangen hui. In mein badshah Porus bhi shamil tha, jis ne daryae Hydaspes (jadeed daur ka daryae Jhelum) ke kinare aik riyasat par hukoomat ki. In jangoan mein Sikandar ki fatahat ne is khitte mein aik mukhtasir muddat ke liye Greek mojoodgi qaim ki. instruction: Mundarja zail mein se kaun sa BSkyB, Ofcom ya teesri party ke channels ko discipline karne ka ikhtiyar nahin hai? Pichlay sawal ko dekhte hue, aik aisa siaq o sabaq likhein jismein jawab mojood ho. Yeh 1 - 20 jumlay ho sakte hain. Siaq o sabaq
output: BSkyB ke paas apne EPG par channels ki mojoodgi par koi veto nahin hai, open raasai office se un ke operating license ka aik laazmi hissa hai. Koi bhi channel jo 28° mashriq mein kisi satellite ke munasib beam par carriage hasil kar sakta hai woh fees ke liye BSkyB ke EPG tak raasai ka haqdaar hai, jo £15 se mukhtalif hai. Teesri party ke channels jo khufia kari ka intikhab karte hain woh kam qeemat se le kar muft EPG entries, BSkyB ke lease par transponder par muft naqal o hamal, ya naqal o hamal ke liye asal adaigi tak chhoot hasil karte hain. Taham, yahan tak ke is surat mein bhi, BSkyB channel ke muhtawa ya tasweer ke mayaar jese naqal o hamal ke masail par koi control nahin rakhta hai.

instruction: Kya Apple 2024 tak sab bara smart phone brand ban jae ga?
output:
iPhone 15 ki launch mein abhi do haftay baqi hain lekin is naye model ne Apple ke 2024 ke ibtida tak sab se badi smart phone company banne ki umeedein aasmanon tak pohancha di hain.

Tajziya kar Ming Chi Kuo ke mutabiq is saal Samsung ke smart phone ki shipment mein 22 karor units ki kami waqeh hui hai. Jis ka matlab hai ke agar 2023 ke dusre shishmahi mein Apple ke orders mein koi tabdeeli nahi aati to iPhone ki shipment 22 karor se 22 karor 50 lakh tak mutawaqqa hai jo Apple ko sab se bara smart phone brand bana de ga.

Apple ka outlook 2024 ke liye pur umeed hai aur 25 karor unit ki farokht ka hadaf mutawaqqa hai jabke Ming Chi Kuo farokht ki sharah mein saal ba saal 5 se 10 fi sad izafa batate hain.
Ming Chi Kuo ke mutabiq Apple ko supply chain masail ki wajah se iPhone 15 shipment mein mazeed kami par tashweesh hai. Jabke iPhone 15 Pro Max ki takheer bara masla sabit ho sakti hai.

Tajziya kar ke

instruction: Come up with a creative way to store shoes in the closet.
output: One creative way to store shoes in the closet is to use three-tiered stackable shoe shelves. This allows for shoes to be stored neatly and in an orderly fashion. Additionally, using shoe boxes or hanging shoes on hooks are also good options for organized storage.

instruction: Describe the process for setting up a wireless network.
output: Setting up a wireless network is relatively easy. First, you'll need a wireless router, which connects your devices to the internet. Next, you'll need to plug the router into an internet connection and configure your settings, such as the network name and security protocols. Once the router is set up, you need to install wireless network adapters on your devices, such as computers and phones, so they can connect to the router. Finally, make sure to regularly update your router's firmware and keep your security measures up-to-date to ensure the safety of your wireless network.

instruction: List the works of Shakespeare.
output: The works of Shakespeare include Romeo and Juliet, Hamlet, Macbeth, Julius Caesar, A Midsummer Night's Dream, Othello, King Lear, Antony and Cleopatra, The Merchant of Venice, Much Ado About Nothing, and The Tempest.

instruction: Robot kya hota hai? Is ke baare mein thora bataye:
output:
Ji zaroor, yeh rahi kuch maloomat robots ke baare mein.

Lafz robot jismani robots aur virtual software agenton dono ka hawala de sakta hai, lekin moakhar al-zikr ko aam tor par bots kaha jata hai. Is baat par koi ittefaq raye nahi hai ke kon si machinein robot ke tor par ahl hain lekin maahireen aur awaam ke darmiyan umoomi ittefaq hai ke robot mundarja zail mein se kuch ya tamam salahiyaton aur afaal ke malik hotay hain: electronic programming ko qabool karen, data ya jismani tasawurat ko electronically qabool karen, khud mukhtari se kaam karen. Kuch had tak, ghoomna phirna, khud ke jismani hisso ya jismani amal ko chalana, apne mahol ko samajhna aur un se hara pheri karna, aur zahanat rawaiye ka muzahira karna, khas tor par aisa rawaiya jo insano ya doosre janwaron ki naqal karta hai. Robot ke tasawwur se mutaliq masnooi hayatiyat ka shoba hai, jo un hastioun ka mutalea karta hai jin ki fitrat machineon ke mu

instruction: Identify an SEO technique and explain how it can be used.
output: One SEO technique that can be used is link building. Link building is the process of creating relevant and authoritative links from other websites to your own. This helps to increase your website's visibility in search engine rankings as well as its credibility. Link building can be done by creating content for other websites or using social media to obtain backlinks from other websites.

instruction: Instagram par audio reels kya hain?
output:
Instagram par audio reels mukhtasar, dilkash aur takhleeqi audio clips hain jinhein sarif takhleeq aur ishtiraak kar sakte hain. Video muwaad ki tarah, audio reels aap ko audio tracks ya soti recordings ko muntakhib karne aur unhein basri anasir, jaise ke tasweerain ya videos ke saath jor kar tafreehi aur maloomati muwaad banane ki ijazat dete hain.

Yeh khusoosiyat sarifeen ko mutaharrik aur interactive format mein audio par mabni muwaad ka istemal karte hue apne aap ko zahir karne, apni shakhsiyat ko zahir karne aur apne pairwakaroon ke saath mashghool hone mein madad karne ke liye banai gayi hai. Yeh Instagram platform ke andar kahani sunane wale tool ke tor par audio ka faida uthana ka aik tareeqa hai.

instruction: Kon si badi Muslim saltanatein theen jinhnon ne junubi Asia par hukoomat ki?
output: Junubi Asia ne kai mumtaz Muslim saltanaton ka urooj dekha. Teen sab se zyada qabil-e-zikr saltanat Dehli, Mughal Saltanat aur Dakan ki saltanatein theen. 13win sadi mein qaim Dehli Saltanat ne Hindustan mein Muslim hukmarani ka aaghaz kiya. Is ke baad Mughal Saltanat, Babur ne 1526 mein qaim ki, jo junubi Asia ki sab se ahem aur paidaar Muslim saltanat ban gayi. Dakan Salateen satah murtafa Dakan mein azaad Muslim riyaston ka aik group tha, har aik ka apna hukmaran khandan tha.

instruction: Nai Delhi ke bare mein bataye:

instruction: Design a logic puzzle for 6th graders.
output:
Joe, Rosie, and Emma are going to the movies. Joe and Rosie want to see a comedy, while Emma only wants to watch a horror film. They have $30 to spend and the tickets are $10 each. If they can't come to an agreement, they'll have to stay home. Can they go see a movie?

1. Joe wants to buy candy
2. Emma wants to buy popcorn
3. Rosie likes to watch horror films

Solution: 
Yes, they can go see a movie. Joe can buy the Horror movie tickets for himself and Emma and Rosie can share the cost of a Comedy movie ticket. Joe and Emma will each have $5 left for snacks, which is enough for one to buy candy and the other to buy popcorn.

instruction: Pyaaz ke chand fawaid batain
output:
Puri duniya mein aam istemaal hone wali pyaaz apne andar herat angaiz khwas rakhti hai. Ise zair-e-zameen agne wala shifa khana kaha jaye to ghalat na hoga.

Doctor hon ya hakeem, pyaaz ko shifa bakhsh qarar dete hain kyun ke ab bhi is ke aham tibbi fawaid samne aa rahe hain. In mein se pyaaz ke chand fawaid yeh hain:

Anti oxidants
Pyaaz bohat sare anti oxidants ka majmua hai jin mein qabil-e-zikr ‘quercetin’ numayan hai. Yeh badan ke andar oxidative stress kam karta hai. Is se androni soozish kam hoti hai aur kai dareena amraz ko khatam karne mein madad milti hai.

Pyaaz, ghizai power house

Pyaaz mein bohat se vitamin, maadniyat aur dusre zaroori ajza paye jate hain. Yeh tamam ajza sehat ke liye intehai mufeed hain. In mein vitamin C, vitamin B6, potassium aur folate badi miqdar mein mojood hain. In tamam ajza ki ahmiyat apni jagah hai jo pyaaz ko sehat ka aik qudrati supplement ban

Puri duniya mein aam istemaal hone wali pyaaz apne andar herat angaiz khwas rakhti hai. Ise zair-e-zameen agne wala shifa khana kaha jaye to ghalat na hoga.

Doctor hon ya hakeem, pyaaz ko shifa bakhsh qarar dete hain kyun ke ab bhi is ke aham tibbi fawaid samne aa rahe hain. In mein se pyaaz ke chand fawaid yeh hain:

Anti oxidants
Pyaaz bohat sare anti oxidants ka majmua hai jin mein qabil-e-zikr ‘quercetin’ numayan hai. Yeh badan ke andar oxidative stress kam karta hai. Is se androni soozish kam hoti hai aur kai dareena amraz ko khatam karne mein madad milti hai.

Pyaaz, ghizai power house

Pyaaz mein bohat se vitamin, maadniyat aur dusre zaroori ajza paye jate hain. Yeh tamam ajza sehat ke liye intehai mufeed hain. In mein vitamin C, vitamin B6, potassium aur folate badi miqdar mein mojood hain. In tamam ajza ki ahmiyat apni jagah hai jo pyaaz ko sehat ka aik qudrati supplement ban

instruction: Aalamgeerat ne asr-e-haazir mein qoum parasti ko kaise mutaasir kiya hai?
output: Globalization ne qoum parasti par paicheeda asraat martab kiye hain. Aik taraf, is ne khayalat, saqafaton aur maeeshaton ke tabadlay mein sahulat faraham ki hai, jis se bahami rabt mein izafa hua hai. Doosri taraf, aalamgeerat ne qoumi shanakht aur khudmukhtari ke khatme ke khadshaat ko janam diya hai. Kuch log daleel detay hain ke aalamgeerat saqaafati imtiyaz aur qoumi khudmukhtari ko majrooh karti hai. Is ke sath hi, in samjhay janay walay khatarat ke jawab mein qoum parast tehreekain ubhri hain, jo qoumi shanakht ke tahaffuz aur aalamgeerat ke asraat ke khilaf gharelo sanaton ke tahaffuz ki wakalat karti hain. Aalamgeerat aur qoum parasti ke darmiyan ta'aamul jadeed duniya ki tashkeel jari rakhe hue hai.

instruction: Bharat mein aabadi ke dhamakay par mazmoon Urdu mein | Article on Population Explosion in India In Urdu
output:
Jis tarah aik chhotay khandan ke baray khandan se zyada khushhaal honay ka imkaan hai, usi tarah kam aabadi wala mulk bhi khushhaali ke apne ahdaaf ko poora karne ka zyada imkaan rakhta hai.

Jab wasail tay ho jatay hain lekin sarfeen ki tadaad mein musalsal izafa hota hai, to wasail ka mukammal crack down hona parta hai aur, Hindustan mein aisa hi hota rehta hai. Is se bhi zyada bura mehsoos karne ke liye woh moqa hai jab humein bataya jata hai ke humare paas anaaj ki wafar miqdaar hai lekin hum aik waqt mein bhook ki wajah se hone wali amwaat ke bare mein suntay hain.

Yeh be zabtgi kisi bhi samajh se balatar hai. Yaqeenan is soorat-e-haal ke paida hone ki aur bhi bohat si wajahaat hain lekin humare tamam masail ki bunyadi jar sirf aabadi se zyada hai. Deegar tamam wajahaat aur masail Hindustan mein aabadi ke dhamakay ke is maslay ke liye

instruction: Sabziyon ke baagh ki mansooba bandi karte waqt kin ahem awamil par ghour karna chahiye?
output: Sabziyon ke baagh ki mansooba bandi mein kai ahem awamil shamil hain. Sab se pehle, apne muntakhib kardah maqam par sooraj ki roshni ka andaza lagayen, kyun ke zyada tar sabziyon ko kam az kam 6-8 ghantay sooraj ki roshni darkar hoti hai. Matti ka mayaar bohat ahem hai, lehaza ghizaiyat ki satah aur pH ka taayun karne ke liye matti ka test karwain. Behtareen nashonuma ke liye podon ke darmiyan munasib faasla zaroori hai. Matti se paida hone wali beemariyon ko rokne ke liye fasl ki gardish par ghour karen. Aakhir mein, apni aab o hawa aur barhne ke mausam ke liye mozoon sabziyon ka intikhab karen, aur pani ki dastiyabi ke liye mansooba banayen, ya to baqaida barish ya aabpashi ke zariye.

instruction: Kya programming seekhna aasan hai?
output:
Aasan mushkil har bande ke ooper hai, koi bhi cheez mehnat kar ke haasil ki ja sakti hai, agar insaan mehnat kare to kya haasil nahi kiya ja sakta.
Yehi cheez programming ke saath hai, is ke liye kuch cheezon ka khayal rakhein:
1. Haar nahi maanna: kachhuay ki speed se agar aap regular chalte raho to aap bohat achay programmer ban sakte ho.
2. Mehnat: kisi bhi field mein maahir banne ke liye 10000 ghante ka usool yaad rakhein, yaani 10000 ghante is mein kaam karke aap maahir ban sakte hain.
3. Dost: aisay dost dhoondein jo mil kar yeh kaam kar rahe hon, un ke saath mil kar seekhein.

instruction: Sawaal: Sanati daur mein naqal o hamal ka irtiqa kaise hua, aur is ka aalami tijarat par kya asar pada?
output: Jawab: Sanati daur ne naqal o hamal mein numayan tabdeeli dekhi. bhaap ke engine, jo George Stephenson ne shuru kiya tha, aur bhaap jahaaz, jo Robert Fulton ke tayar kardah engineon se chal raha tha, ne samaan aur logon ki naqal o harkat mein inqilab barpa kar diya. railway aur nehron ne pehlay se alag thalag ilaqon aur qaumon ko jorne ke liye taiz raftaar aur zyada moassar naqal o hamal ki sahulat faraham ki. is peshraft ne dramaai tor par naqal o hamal ke ikhrajat aur waqt ko kam kiya, jis se aalami tijarat ko be-misaal paimane par sahulat faraham ki gayi. khaam maal aur tayar samaan ki naqal o hamal ki salahiyat ne iqtisadi taraqqi, market tak rasai mein izafa, aur qaumi aur aalami maeeshaton ke inzimam mein moassar kirdar ada kiya.

instruction: Cricket World Cup 2023: Pakistan ne kya kuch khoya?
output:
Terhween World Cup mein saabiq champion Pakistan ka safar Kolkata ke Eden Garden mein ain us din ikhtitam pazeer hua jab sara India roshniyon ka tehwar Diwali mana raha tha. Aise mein bazahir Pakistan ke camp mein udasi mayoosi aur andhera tha.

Ashyai teamon ke liye lamha-e-fikriya semi final ki chaar teamon ko dekh kar hota hai. Yahan ke halaat ka faida teen ghair-ashyai teamon ne bharpoor andaaz mein uthaya. Maazi ke azeem balle baaz Zaheer Abbas ke mutabiq Pakistan ki na balle baazi aur na gaind baazi mein karkardagi mustaqil mili.

Yeh teesra World Cup hai badqismati se jis mein Pakistan semi final ke league qualify nahi kar saka. Umeedon, muradon aur daawon se shuru hone wali World Cup ki muhim bujhe bujhe andaaz mein jis tarah aage barhi woh qudrat ki madad ke bawajood kisi muhim jo kefiyat ki bilkul aaina daar nahi thi.

Aakhri match aisi team se tha jo difaai champion thi lekin rawan World Cup mein us ki bhi sab se badtareen karkardagi rahi. Agar

instruction: Take the following description and create a story.
input: Nina had a single red balloon and a bowl of ice cream.
output: Nina was eager to go on her first adventure. She had a single, bright red balloon and a bowl of cold and creamy ice cream. She took a deep breath and carefully opened the gate of her garden. She carefully untied her red balloon and soared up, high and higher still, into the blue sky above. She could see the houses and gardens getting smaller and smaller. Eventually she reached a beautiful meadow with multicolored flowers and buzzing insects. Nina floated above them and enjoyed the scenery, while eating her ice cream. She flew in the clouds, admiring the beauty of the world. Finally, when the sun was setting, Nina and her red balloon slowly made their way back home.

instruction: Misr ke dar ul hukoomat Qahira ke bare mein kuch batain.
output:
Ji zaroor, yeh rahi kuch maloomat Qahira ke bare mein:

Qahira Misr ka dar ul hukoomat aur Africa, Arab duniya aur Mashriq Wusta mein sab se bara shehri majmua hai. Qahira kubra metropolitan ilaqa, jis ki abadi 21.9 million hai, abadi ke lehaaz se duniya ka barahwan bara mega shehar hai. Qahira ka talluq qadeem Misr se hai, kyun ke ahramat Giza aur qadeem shehar Memphis aur Ain Shams is ke jughrafiyai ilaqe mein waqeh hain. Nile Delta ke qareeb waqeh, shehar sab se pehle Fustat ke tor par abad hua, aik basti jis ki bunyaad Musalmanon ki fatah Misr ke baad 640 E mein aik mojooda qadeem Romi qila, Babylon ke sath rakhi gayi thi. Daulat Fatimiyah ke taht 969 E mein qareeb hi aik naye shehar al-Qahira ki bunyaad rakhi gayi. Is ne baad mein Ayyubi Saltanat aur Saltanat Mamluk (Misr) adwar (barahwin-solahwin sadi) ke

output: The primary purpose of the AMBER Alert system is to quickly disseminate information about an abducted child in order to recruit the public's help in locating the child and apprehending any suspects involved. instruction: Bairooni hamlon aur jughrafiyai siyasi challengeon ne Mughal Saltanat ke zawal ko kaise taiz kiya?
output:
Bairooni hamlon aur jughrafiyai siyasi challengeon ne Mughal Saltanat ke zawal ka aik ahem marhala qarar diya. 1739 mein Nadir Shah ka hamla, jis ka ikhtitam Dehli ki bori par hua, aik watershed lamha tha. Saltanat iqtisadi tor par tabah ho gayi thi, aur is ki siyasi authority buri tarah kamzor ho gayi thi. Is ke saath hi, ilaqai quwaton, jaise Marathay aur Sikhon ka urooj, aur European istemaari mufadat ke tasallut ne ahem challenges ka samna kiya.

1757 mein Plassey ki jang ne aik ahem mor ka nishan lagaya, jis mein British East India Company ne urooj hasil kiya. Is jughrafiyai siyasi tabdeeli ne Mughal iqtidar ke khatme ko taiz kar diya. Saltanat ne khud ko bairooni dabao ka samna karne se qasir paya aur apne wasee khittoun par control barqarar rakhne ke liye jidojehad ki, jis se is ke hatmi zawal ka sabab bane.

1757 mein Plassey ki jang ne aik ahem mor ka nishan lagaya, jis mein British East India Company ne urooj hasil kiya. Is jughrafiyai siyasi tabdeeli ne Mughal iqtidar ke khatme ko taiz kar diya. Saltanat ne khud ko bairooni dabao ka samna karne se qasir paya aur apne wasee khittoun par control barqarar rakhne ke liye jidojehad ki, jis se is ke hatmi zawal ka sabab bane.

instruction: Compare and contrast the concept of food deserts with food swamps
output: Food deserts and food swamps are both terms that refer to the geographic availability of healthful foods. Food deserts describe areas where there is limited availability of healthful foods due to their high cost or lack of access. Food swamps refer to areas where there is easy access to less healthful, more processed and fast foods, often at a lower cost. The difference between food deserts and food swamps lies in the types of food that are accessible to people in those geographic areas. Food deserts lack access to healthy foods, while food swamps provide access to mainly processed and less nutritious foods. The causes for food deserts and food swamps vary and are largely dependent on the socioeconomic landscape of a particular region.

instruction: Dil ke amraz se bachne ke liye kis qisam ka khana khana chahiye?
output:
Aap ko yeh maloom ho ga ke kuch makhsoos ghizain khanay se dil ki bemariyan paida hoti hain aur apni diet ko tabdeel karna bhi mushkil ho jata hai.
NDTV ke mutabiq dil ko bemariyon se bachanay wali saat ghizain bhi hain jin ke khanay se aap apne dil ko sehat mand rakh saktay hain.
Aaiye jantay hain ke dil ko sehat mand rakhne wali saat ghizain kaun si hain.
Kala lobia
Kala lobia wazan mein halka, lachakdar aur ma'daniyat se bharpur hota hai. Magnesium, folate aur anti-oxidant blood pressure ko kam rakhne mein madad faraham karte hain. Un ke fiber se blood sugar control karne mein madad milti hai aur cholesterol theek rehta hai. Aap kalay lobiyay ko soup aur salad mein shamil kar ke ma'daniyat se mazeed se faida utha saktay hain.
Alsi ka beej aur tukhm-e-sharbati
Alsi ke beej aur tukhm-e-sharbati mein omega-3 fatty acid ki bari miqdar payi jati hai. In beejon mein fatty

instruction: Baheera Room ke bare mein bataye:
output:
Baheera Room, ya angrezi mein Lake Baikal, Russia mein waqeh hone wala duniya ka sab se gehra aur purana tareen baheera hai. Yeh baheera Siberia mein waqeh hai aur Russian Federation ka hissa hai.

Chand ahem tafseelaat:

1. Gehraai:
Baheera Room ko aam tor par duniya ka sab se gehra baheera qarar diya jata hai. Is ki gehraai taqreeban 1,642 meter (5,387 feet) hai.

2. Masahat:
Baheera Room ki masahat taqreeban 31,722 murabba kilometer (12,248 murabba mile) hai, jis se yeh duniya ka sab se bara taza pani ka baheera bhi hai.

3. Pani ki safai:
Baheera Room ka pani bohat saaf hota hai aur yeh aasmani neelay rang ka hota hai.

4. Geologyai ahemiyat:
Yeh baheera aik bohat zyada mazboot geologyai peshewarana hudood hai aur iska ahem hissa Baikal region ke thetre mein aata hai.

5. Baikal region:
Baheera Room ke ird gird ilaqe ko "Baikal region" kaha jata hai jo Russia ke Buryat Baikal

instruction: Mukhtasar kahani aur ikhlaqi kahani "biwa aur is ki chhoti londiyan" mukammal kahani Urdu mein | Short Story and Moral Story "The Widow and Her Little Maidens" Complete Story In Urdu
output:
Biwa aur is ki chhoti larkiyan
Aik khubsurat chhotay ghar mein, aik baar aik saaf suthri boorhi biwa rehti thi jis ne sab se saaf topiyan aur behtareen romaal pehna tha jo aap ne apni zindagi mein kabhi nahi dekha tha. Usay dhone aur jhaarna aur baking aur silai ka bohat shauq tha! Har koi jo usay jaanta tha kehta tha ke woh sab se zyada mehnati khatoon thi jise unhon ne kabhi nahi dekha tha aur poore gaon ke liye aik misaal thi.

Is naik aurat ke saath do chhoti bachiyan rehti thin jinhein woh hamesha apne jaisa saaf suthra banane ki koshish karti thi. Us ne unhein roti goondhna, chawal aur khana pakana sikhaya. Us ne unhein apne charkhi par bareek dhaaga ghumana bhi sikhaya. Har subah, jis lamhe se sehan mein baday bhooray

instruction: Large Language Models ke bare mein kuch batain.
output:
Large Language Models se murad woh Language Models hain jo apne size mein bohat baray models hotay hain aur amooman in mein billions ke hisaab se parameters hotay hain. Chand mashhoor models mein GPT-3 jo OpenAI ka hai, PaLM aur LaMDA jo Google ke hain, LLaMA jo Meta ka hai. Yeh models bohat zyada taqat ke haamil hotay hain aur language generation ke liye bohat taqatwar hain. Yeh sawal jawab, tarjuma, code likhne, waghera jaisi khususiyaat ke haamil hotay hain. In models ne searching ko aik naya maani diya hai.
Jaisay jaisay jadeed models aa rahe hain, inki taqat aur quwat mein bhi izafa ho raha hai, in models ki madad se log agents bana rahe hain jaisay GPTEngineer, AgentGPT, BabyAGI waghera.

instruction:

z-5 = 6
Is sawal mein z ki kya value hai? Har cheez soch kar hal karein
output:

Hum agar sawal ko samjhein to humein pata chalta hai ke hum ne z ki value ko dhoondna hai.

Hum log z ko aik side par akela karein ge, abhi z ke sath -5 hai.

Teesra step:
Hum log doosri side ka jawab nikaalein ge jo ke 11 hai. Jis se humein pata chalta hai ke
z = 11

instruction: S M Zafar kaun hai
output:
Syed Muhammad Zafar (6 December 1930 - 19 October 2023), Pakistan ke insani huqooq ke karkunon mein se aik the woh aik mashhoor wakeel (Senior Advocate Supreme Court) aur aik siyasat daan aur Senate of Pakistan ke rukun the. Woh kuch arsa tak Pakistan Muslim League (Q) se wabasta rahe.[3]

Ibtidai zindagi aur taleem
Un ka mukammal naam Syed Muhammad Zafar tha aur 6 December 1930 ko Rangoon, Burma mein paida hue. Ibtidai taleem Rangoon mein haasil ki.[4] Wahan ke halaat kashida hue to Punjab aa gaye, Shakargarh ke qareeb Chak Qaziyan un ka abai ilaqa tha, Shakargarh se 1945 mein matric kiya, baad az aan inter aur qanoon ki taleem Lahore se haasil ki, Government College Lahore mein Qiyam Pakistan se do saal pehle dakhla liya aur qiyam ke do saal baad graduation mukammal ki aur 2002 mein Old Ravian Association ke sadar bhi rahe.

Siyasi zindagi
1950 mein wakalat shuru ki. 1965 ki Pak Bharat jang ke douran Pakistan ke Wazir-e-Qanoon the

instruction: Create a JavaScript program to print the maximum and minimum of given numbers?
Junubi Asia mein Mughal Saltanat ke zawal ki wajah kya thi?
output:
Mughal Saltanat ka zawal aik paicheeda amal tha jo mukhtalif awamil ke nateeje mein hua. Aik aham ansar European mojoodgi mein izafa tha, khas tor par British East India Company, jis ne aahista aahista Hindustan ke kuch hisson par apna control sanbhal liya. Androoni jhagray, jaise janasheenii ke tanaza'at ne bhi saltanat ko kamzor kiya. Maashi awamil, bashamool maliyati badintizami, afraat zar, aur bhaari taxes ne saltanat ke wasail ko mazeed tang kar diya.

Mazeed bar'aan, Afghan hukmaran Ahmad Shah Durrani jaisi bairooni quwaton ke hamlon ne Mughloon ki hukoomat ko mazeed kamzor kiya. 19win sadi ke wast tak, Angrezon ne mo'asar tor par Hindustan par qabza kar liya tha, aur Mughal Shehenshah Bahadur Shah Zafar ko 1857 ke Hindustani baghawat ke baad jala watan kar diya gaya tha. Is ke zawal ke bawajood, Mughal Saltanat ka saqaafati aur tareekhi asar o rasookh junubi Asiai virsay

instruction: How would you explain artificial neural networks to a middle school student?
output: Artificial neural networks are inspired by the structure and functioning of the brain. They are designed as networks of neurons, just like in the brain, which receive input and give output to create predictions or perform tasks. Artificial neural networks are used to analyze large amounts of data in order to make decisions and recognize patterns. They are similar to how our brains work and they can be used to build computers that can 'think' like humans.

Sir Francis Bacon ka usool "ilm taqat hai" aaj bhi mu'asir duniya mein ahmiyat rakhta hai aur ilmi taleem aur tarbiyat ke moqiat ko seekhne aur tashheer dene ke liye humein samajhne ki targheeb deta hai. Is usool ke wasee ma'ani darj zail hain:

Ilm ke zariye, insaan jadeed tareen technology ko takhleeq karta hai, ijtimai masail ka hal talash karta hai, aur samaji tabdeeli ki jaanch partaal karta hai.

2. **Ilm aur tashheer ka matlab**: Ilm ki taqat ka itlaq na sirf khud taleem aur seekhne par hota hai balkay is ka aik aham hissa tashheer hai. Ilm ko doosron ke saath mushtarik karne ka matlab hai taake zyada se zyada log is se mustafeed ho saken.

3. **Faislay ki quwat**: Ilm aur tale

instruction: "Nasl taasub ya nasl parasti" par mazmoon mukammal mazmoon
output:
Nasli taasub ya nasl parasti
Safed naslon par ghour karein ke woh fitrat ke lehaaz se doosri naslon se bartar hain aur sirf wahi hain. Tehzeeb ke ma'maar. Bani nau insaan ke azeem asaatza ki jild safed nahi thi. Nasli taasub hamesha se maujood hai lekin ab yeh zyada khatarnaak hai. Rhodesia (Zimbabwe) aur junubi Africa mein safed faamon ne wahshiyon jaisa sulook kiya. Nasli taasub bohat nuqsan ka bais banay ga jaisa ke maazi mein hua hai. Hindustan mein, Mahatma Gandhi ki behtareen koshishon ke bawajood, nasli nafrat urooj par hai., yeh khush qismati hai ke poori duniya mein log awaaz utha rahe hain. Nasli taasub ke khilaf un ki awaaz. Ise duniya ke tamam mumalik ki ijtimai koshishon se door kiya ja sakta hai.

Yeh aqeeda ke insaniyat fitratan, aisoun aur zaili naslon mein bati hui hai. Baaz naslein fitri taur par nafsiati waq

Hindustan mein, Mahatma Gandhi ki behtareen koshishon ke bawajood, nasli nafrat urooj par hai., yeh khush qismati hai ke poori duniya mein log awaaz utha rahe hain. Nasli taasub ke khilaf un ki awaaz. Ise duniya ke tamam mumalik ki ijtimai koshishon se door kiya ja sakta hai.

Yeh aqeeda ke insaniyat fitratan, aisoun aur zaili naslon mein bati hui hai. Baaz naslein fitri taur par nafsiati waq

instruction: Kya Bharti fauj ka Bangladesh sarhad par shehad ki makhiyan taayunat karne ka faisla?
output:
Nai Dehli Bharat ki Border Security Force ne Bangladesh ke saath sarhad par smuggling, darandazi aur dusre jurm rokne ke liye fauji jawanon ki bajaye shehad ki makhiyan taayunat karne ka faisla kar liya.

Bharti media reports ke mutabiq Nadia samait kuch ilaqon mein maveshi, sona, chandi aur nasha awar ashya ki smuggling ka khatra zyada hai, jis ki wajah se BSF jawan sarhad par shehad ki makhiyon ka chhatta laga rahe hain. Agar jurm peshon ne koi bhi harkat ki to yeh shehad ki makhiyan unhein chorain gi nahi.

BSF ki 32win battalion ke commandant Sujit Kumar ke mutabiq is tarah ke pehle mansooba ko Nadia zila ke sarhadi ilaqa mein shuru kiya gaya hai. Ghor karne wali baat yeh hai ke is mansooba se muqami logon ko rozgar bhi mile ga.

Commandant Sujit Kumar ka kehna hai ke BSF ki janib se is mansooba mein Ayush wazarat ko bhi shamil kiya gaya hai, aur wazarat

instruction: Bhagat Singh ka falsafah kya hai?
output:
Hindustani inqilabi aur azadi pasand Bhagat Singh ka aik alag falsafah tha jis ki jureen azadi aur samaji insaaf ki jidojehad mein theen. Un ke falsafay ke chand ahem pehluon mein shamil hain:

1-Qaum ke liye qurbani: Bhagat Singh qaum ki azadi ke liye be-lous qurbani ki ahmiyat par yaqeen rakhte the. Unhon ne mashhoor kaha, "Inqilab zindabad" (Inqilab zindabad), azadi ke maqsad se apni ghair mutazalzal wabastagi ka izhar karte hue, yahan tak ke apni jaan ki qeemat par.

2-Secularism aur shumooliyat: Bhagat Singh ka Hindustan ke liye vision jami' aur secular tha. Unhon ne firqa parasti ki mukhalifat ki aur aik muttahid, secular Hindustan mein yaqeen rakhte the jahan tamam mazhab aur pas manzar ke log mil jul kar hum aahangi se rahein ge.

3-Socialism aur iqtisadi masawat: Bhagat Singh socialist nazariyat se mutasir the aur maashi adam masawat ke bare mein fikr mand the. Unhon ne siyasi

output:

Apna kya hai saare shehar ka ik jaisa nuqsaan hua
Yeh dil, yeh aaseb ki nagri, maskan sochon, wahmon ka
Soch raha hoon is nagri mein tu kab se mehmaan hua
Sehra ki munh zor hawaen auron se mansoob hueen
Muft mein hum aawara thehre muft mein ghar weraan hua
Mere haal pe hairat kaisi dard ke tanha mausam mein
Pathar bhi ro parte hain insaan to phir insaan hua
Itni der mein ujre dil par kitne mahshar beet gaye
Jitni der mein tujh ko pa kar khone ka imkaan hua
Kal tak jis ke gird tha raqsaan ik anbooh sitaron ka
Aaj usi ko tanha pa kar main to bohat hairaan hua
Us ke zakhm chhupa kar rakhiye khud us shakhs ki nazron se
Us se kaisa shikwa kije woh to abhi nadaan hua
Jin ashkon ki pheeki low ko hum bekaar samajhte the
Un ashkon se kitna roshan ik tareek makaan hua
Y

instruction: Konsi ghazain dobara garam karke istemaal karna intehai khatarnak sabit hosakta hai?
output:
Log apni sehat ka khayal rakhne ke liye tarah tarah ki ghazain istemaal karte hain, magar woh yeh nahi jante ke baaz ghazain aisi bhi hain jinhein agar dobara garam karke istemaal kiya jaye to woh sehat ke liye intehai khatarnak sabit hosakti hain.

Tibbi maahireen tajweez karte hain ke agar aap ko apni sehat azeez hai to frozen foods (jami hui ghazain), fast food aur tali hui ghazao se ijtinaab karna hoga, yahi nahi balkay kuch ghazain aisi bhi hain jinhein agar dobara garam kiya jaye to woh sehat ke liye intehai khatarnak kirdar ada karsakti hain.

Maahireen ka dawa hai ke paki hui ghazao ko baar baar microwave oven mein garam karna aap ki sehat par intehai muzir asraat martab karta hai.

Sciencee tehqeeq se pata chalta hai ke kuch makhsoos ghazain aisi hain jinhein khanay ke liye agar dobara garam kiya jaye to in mein muzir-e-sehat bacteria

instruction: How can a company increase employee productivity?
output: A company can increase employee productivity by fostering a positive and rewarding work environment. This could involve recognizing individual employees for their contributions, implementing systems of flexible working arrangements, providing clear communication and feedback, offering career development opportunities, and setting achievable goals and objectives. Additionally, the company should focus on creating an environment of trust and collaboration, as well as providing access to necessary resources and tools.

instruction: What is the role of a template engine in software engineering?
output: A template engine is an integral part of software engineering. Templates are used to ensure consistency in design across multiple projects and platforms, and to minimize the amount of manual coding needed. Template engines allow developers to easily integrate existing HTML or CSS templates into a project, without having to write the code from scratch. In addition, they can also be used to help generate code by using a template as a starting point, which can then be customized as needed.

instruction: Yahoo ka naam to aap ne suna hoga lekin kya aap ko maloom hai is ka matlab kya hai?
output:
New York (Monitoring Desk) internet sarfeen teen dahaiyon se Yahoo ka naam sunte aa rahe hain aur beshtar Yahoo ki email service samait deegar services bhi istemal kar rahe hon ge taham yeh baat yaqeen se kahi ja sakti hai ke aksar log lafz 'Yahoo' ka matlab nahi jante hon ge.
Daily Star ke mutabiq 1994 mein Jerry Young aur David Filo ne yeh website tayar ki, jis ka ibtidaai naam 'Jerry and David's Guide' tha. Teen mah baad is ka naam tabdeel kar ke 'Yahoo' rakh diya gaya, jis ka matlab jan'nay mein logon ko 30 saal ka arsa lag gaya hai.
Report ke mutabiq behas o mubahisay ke platform Reddit par aik sarif ne bataya hai ke Yahoo darasal 'You Always Have Other Options' ka mukhafaf hai, yani 'aap ke paas hamesha deegar moqaay hotay hain.'
Jerry aur David us waqt electrical engineering graduate student thay, jab unhon ne 'Yahoo.com' ke naam se January 1995 mein domain khareeda. Unhon ne is platform par na sirf muft email service muhaiya ki balkeh Yahoo chat aur news

instruction: Describe the Aztec calendar
output: The Aztec calendar was an adaptation of the Mayan calendar, used by the Aztecs and other Pre-Columbian people in Central Mexico. It was a 365-day calendar that was divided into 18 months, each with 20 days. The remaining 5 days were considered unlucky and were not part of the regular year. The calendar was used to note important religious and social events, as well as keep track of time.

The image shows two people, one of whom is sitting in a tower adorned with symbols of wealth, while the other is struggling to make ends meet and relying on crutches to get by. This illustrative comparison highlights the increasing gap in economic well-being between the few who are wealthy and the majority who are struggling to make a living.

instruction: Large Language Models ke bare mein kuch batain. Large Language Models ke bare mein aap ko kya maloomat chahiye? Large Language Models kya hotay hain?
output: Large Language Models woh khudkar tareeqa hain jinhein text tawleed, tarjuma, sawal jawabi, aur mukhtalif zabani kamon ke liye tarbiyat di gayi hai. Yeh models aam tor par zyada data par mabni hotay hain, jis ki wajah se in ke paas wasee ilmi khurd ki mojoodgi hoti hai. Aap jaise user in se text ke zariye baat cheet kar saktay hain aur in se mukhtalif mozoat par maloomat hasil kar saktay hain.. Chand mashhoor models mein GPT-3 jo OpenAI ka hai, PaLM aur LaMDA jo Google ke hain, LLaMA jo Meta ka hai. Yeh models bohat zyada taqat ke haamil hotay hain aur language generation ke liye bohat taqatwar hain. Yeh sawal jawab, tarjuma, code likhne, waghera jaisi khususiyaat ke haamil hotay hain. In models ne searching ko aik naya maani diya hai.

instruction: Sawal: sarmaya daari ki tanqideen kya hain aur yeh waqt ke saath kis tarah dhal raha hai?
output: Jawab: sarmaya daari ke naqideen aamdani mein adam masawat, maholiyati inhitat, aur mehnat ke mumkin istihsal jese masail ki taraf ishaara karte hain. Waqt guzarnay ke saath, sarmaya daari ne samaji tahaffuz ke jaal, mazdoor qawaneen, aur maholiyati zawabit ki taraqqi ke zariye in mein se kuch khadshaat ko hal karne ke liye dhal liya hai. Sarmaya daari ki mukhtalif shakalain, jese samaji sarmaya daari ya jami sarmaya daari, ubhar kar samne aayi hain, jo aik zyada mutawazan nuqta nazar par zor deti hain jo iqtisadi taraqqi ke saath saath samaji aur maholiyati asraat ko bhi samajhta hai.

instruction: Write a 500-word blog post about the value of art in education.
output:
In this day and age, it is becoming increasingly clear that art has never been more valuable in education. Art can be a powerful tool in helping students learn and understand more complex topics. It can also be used to foster creativity and innovation, and to develop essential skills such as critical thinking and problem solving. 

For starters, art can be a great way for students to deepen their understanding of various school subjects. By creating visual representations of concepts, it can help to bring these concepts to life in a way that helps students better comprehend them. For example, by creating a painting of a cell, students can observe and analyze structures in a way that would otherwise be difficult to achieve. 

Similarly, art is a great way to encourage creative thinking. By experimenting with different materials, techniques, and concepts, students can come up with innovative ideas and solutions to problems. Creative thinking is an invaluable asset in the world today, and art can be a great way to help students hone their skills. 

Art can also help to develop essential skills such as critical thinking and problem solving. By engaging in art activities, students can practice expressing their own ideas in unique ways. They can also learn to evaluate and analyze different pieces of art to develop their own interpretations of the work. 

Moreover, art can have a positive impact on students’ emotional wellbeing. Through art, students can find a creative outlet to express their feelings and to connect with their peers. This can help them become more confident in their abilities and to develop a deep sense of pride in their accomplishments. 

All in all, the value of art in education cannot be understated. Art can help to deepen understanding of various subjects, foster creativity and innovation, and develop important skills such as critical thinking and problem solving. It can also improve emotional wellbeing, which is essential to student success.

instruction: Explain why fossil fuels are non-renewable resources.
output: Fossil fuels such as oil, coal, and natural gas are non-renewable resources due to the fact that they are finite and cannot be replaced once they are used. Fossil fuels are created over millions of years from decaying organisms, and the rate at which they are created is much slower than the rate at which they are being consumed. Fossil fuels are valuable sources of energy, but they are not renewable and therefore cannot be replaced once used. Additionally, the use of fossil fuels releases harmful pollutants into the atmosphere, further exacerbating the negative environmental impact.

instruction: Guess the next element in a given sequence

output:

Hum ne college mein taleem to zaroor payi aur rafta rafta B.A bhi pass kar liya, lekin is nisf sadi ke douran jo college mein guzarna padi, hostel mein dakhil hone ki ijazat humein sirf aik hi dafa mili.

Khuda ka yeh fazl hum par kab aur kis tarah hua, yeh sawal aik dastaan ka mohtaaj hai.

Jab hum ne entrance pass kiya to muqami school ke head master sahab khaas tor se mubarak baad dene ke liye aaye. Qareebi rishte daaron ne daawatein deen. Muhalle walon mein mithai baanti gayi aur humare ghar walon par yak lacht is baat ka inkishaaf hua ke woh larka jise aaj tak apni kotah beeni ki wajah se aik bekaar aur nalaaiq farzand samajh rahe the. Dar asal la mahdood qabiliyatoun ka malik hai, jis ki nashonuma par be shumar aanay wali nasaloun ki bahboodi ka inhisaar hai. Chunancha humari aindah zindagi ke mutaliq

input: The media plays a powerful role in shaping public opinion from the topics that are discussed to the language used to discuss them. output: The media has considerable influence on public opinion, which shapes people's attitudes, beliefs and behaviour. Un ki adabi tasaneef, jaisa ke Asar us-Sanadeed (Hindustani fun-e-ta'ameer par aik bunyadi kaam) aur Tahzeeb ul-Akhlaq (samaji wa saqaafati islaahat ko farogh dene wala jareeda), jis ka maqsad Hindustan mein Musalmanon ke shandar virsay ko zinda karna hai. Asar us-Sanadeed ne Hindustan ke Islami virsay mein fakhr ke ehsas par zor dete hue tareekhi yadgaron ki dastaveez ki hai. Tahzeeb ul-Akhlaq ne samaji aur ikhlaqi islaahat ko farogh diya, Musalmanon ko jadeed taleem aur aadaab ko apnane ki targheeb di. In adabi koshish

Mukhtalif mazhabi rad-e-amal mein yeh khayal shamil hai ke insaan ki azad marzi se burai ke imkaan ki zaroorat hoti hai, ya yeh ke musaibat insani samajh se balatar aik azeem maqsad ki takmeel karta hai. Burai ka masla mazhab ke falsafay mein aik gehra challenge hai.

instruction: Create an algorithm for playing tic tac toe in Python.
output: The algorithm should first create a 3-by-3 tic-tac-toe board. Then it should check the board for a winning move. If a player has the opportunity to make a winning move, the algorithm should take that move. Otherwise, it should examine the board to block the opponent from making a winning move. Finally, if no winning moves or blocks can be made, the algorithm should randomly select an available spot as the next move.

instruction: Sir Syed Ahmed Khan ka do qaumi nazriya waqt ke saath kis tarah tayyar hua, aur is ne 20win sadi mein Pakistan ke qiyam ki nazriati bunyaden rakhne mein kya kirdar ada kiya?
output: Sir Syed Ahmed Khan ka do qaumi nazriya, ibtidaai tor par 19win sadi ke Hindustan mein Musalmanon ke samaji wa siyasi halaat ke jawab ke tor par waza kiya gaya, waqt ke saath saath is mein numayan irtiqa hua. Jab ke is ne ibtidaai tor par mojooda framework ke andar samaji wa iqtisadi taraqqi aur siyasi numaindagi par tawajjo markooz ki, is ke baad Allama Iqbal aur Muhammad Ali Jinnah jese rehnumaon ne apne nazriyat ko wusat di. Do qaumi nazriya, jaisa ke 20win sadi mein bayan kiya gaya tha, ne yeh mowaqif ikhtiyar kiya ke Hindu aur Musalman mukhtalif tareekhi, saqaafati aur mazhabi shanakhton ke saath alag alag qaumein hain, jis ki wajah se aik alag Muslim riyasat ka mutalba shuru hua, jis ke nateejay mein 1947 mein Pakistan ka qiy

instruction: Summarize the given text into 5 lines.
input: Many people find security systems to be too costly, but they don't understand the high cost of ignoring such a system. Security systems are designed to deter potential criminals, detecting disturbances and alerting you to any threats. A good security system won't just protect your property, but also protect your family. You can also use them to monitor activity within your home while you're away.
output: Security systems are designed to protect your property and family from potential criminals and disturbances. They can alert you to potential threats, detect unusual activity and monitor your home while you're away. Despite the costs, the high cost of not having a security system is often much higher. Investing in a good security system can provide peace of mind and make your home a safer place for you and your family.

instruction: Explain the basics of agile software development.
output: Agile software development is an iterative and incremental process that puts emphasis on customer collaboration, continual improvement and quick feedback loops. It is based on the idea of teams self-organizing and adapting to changes quickly. Agile methodology heavily involves collaboration between stakeholders, teams, and customers and also prioritizes rapid response time to changes in customer requirements and wants.

instruction: Adheer umri mein depression se kaise bacha jaye?
output:
Aksar dekha gaya hai ke adheer umri mein pohanch kar log depression ka shikar ho jate hain, jis ke saddbab ke liye mukhtalif qisam ki adwiyat ka sahara lena parta hai, magar khushk mewa jat se bhi depression se mehfooz raha ja sakta hai, jis se zehni sehat mein bhi behtari aaye gi.

Khushk mewa jat ki agar baat ki jaye to is mein akhrot, anjeer, badam, pista, kaju is ke ilawa deegar dry fruits shamil hain.

In ki afadiyat ki agar baat ki jaye to in mein vitamins, fiber, potassium, fatty acids aur anti-oxidants samait deegar ajza shamil hotay hain, yeh ajza aap ke jism ko matloob ghizai miqdar faraham karne mein madadgar sabit hotay hain.

Bartani maharreen ki janib se is par taweel tehqiq ki gayi, is doran 13 hazar se razakaroon ki zehni sehat ko jancha gaya.

Razakaroon mein nisf khawateen shamil theen aur tamam razakaroon ki umren 55 saal se zayed theen.

Mahreen ki

instruction: Sayyaron ke mahol hamare nizaam shamsi mein har aik aasmani jism ki munfarid khususiyaat mein kaise hissa dalte hain, aur in fazaon ka mutalea sayyaron aur chaandon ki tashkeel, irtiqa aur rehaish ke baare mein kaise baseerat faraham karta hai?
output: Sayyaron ke mahol hamare nizaam shamsi mein aasmani ajsaam ki mutanaw khususiyaat ki tashkeel mein ahem kirdar ada karte hain. Zehra ke ghane aur hungama khez mahol se le kar Mars ke patle aur thanday mahol tak, har sayyare aur chaand ki aik munfarid saakht aur saakht hai. In fazaon ka mutalea sayyaron ki tashkeel ke amal, satahi halaat ke irtiqa, aur aasmani ajsaam ke mumkin rehaish ke baare mein qabil-e-qadr baseerat faraham karta hai. Misaal ke taur par, Zehra ka ghana mahol is ke shadeed greenhouse asar mein hissa dalta hai, jis ke nateeje mein satah ka darja hararat barhta hai jo seesaa pighla sakta hai. Is ke bar-aks, Mars ka patla mahol is ki sard satah ke

instruction: Create an algorithm to classify text.
output: The algorithm should begin by tokenizing the text, that is, breaking it down into separate words or phrases. This can be done using a library like NLTK. Next, the algorithm should create an appropriate list of features to represent the text data. This could include the lexical richness of the text, the length of words, the presence of certain words or phrases, and any other features that will help the algorithm to better classify the text. Once the features are extracted, the algorithm should split the data into training and testing sets. Finally, the algorithm should use a machine learning algorithm, such as logistic regression or Naive Bayes, to train the data and generate predictions for the test data.

instruction: Pehli jang-e-azeem ke dauran khandaq ki jang ki kya ahmiyat thi?
output: Khandaq ki jang pehli jang-e-azeem ki aik wazeh aur sangeen khusoosiyat thi. Angrezi Channel se Switzerland tak phailay maghribi mohaaz ne khandaqon ka aik wasee network dekha jahan fauji rehte the aur larte the. Khandaq ki jang jadeed hathyaaron ki taqat aur riwayati fauji hikmat-e-amliyon ki na kafi hone ki wajah se ubhri. Fauji ko sakht halaat ka samna karna pada, anasir ki musalsal numayish ke saath badhali mein rehte the. Khandaqon ko khardaar taaron aur machine gunon se mazboot kiya gaya, jis se aik mehlak aur jamid mohaaz bana. Ladaiyon ke nateeje mein aksar kam se kam ilaqai fawaid hasil hotay hain, jis ke nateeje mein taweel aur safakana ta'atul paida hota hai. Khandaq ki jang ki holnaakiyan jang-e-azeem ke dauran fauji ko darpaish mushkilat ki alamat ban gayeen.

instruction: Waliden ki mohabbat ke bare mein aik gana likhein
output:
Maan baap ki mohabbat, un ke baghair kuch bhi nahin,
dil ki gehrayioun mein, un ki mohabbat hai chhupi.
Jab duniya ki laraayioun mein, hum be panah hotay hain,
maan baap ki duaon mein, un ki mohabbat hai sir chhupi.

Maan baap ki mohabbat, lakhon ki keemat hai,
yeh pyar ki kahani, har dil ki zabani.

Mehnaton ki raton mein, woh roshni ki tarah hotay hain,
hamesha saath hotay hain, dil ki baton ko samajhtay hain.
Jab duniya ki tangiyon mein, hum kamzor hotay hain,
maan baap ki himayat mein, un ki mohabbat hai be misaal.

Maan baap ki mohabbat, lakhon ki keemat hai,
yeh pyar ki kahani, har dil ki zabani.

Jannat mein bhi parsaiyon ko, un ki mohabbat ka ehtram hai,
maan baap ki dekh bhaal mein, sukoon aur suwa hai chhupa.

Maan baap ki mohabbat, lakhon ki keemat hai,
yeh pyar ki kahani, har dil ki zabani.

instruction: Create a metaphor to describe the situation of today’s job market.
output: The job market today is like a minefield - employers are the picketted soldiers, and job seekers are the metal detectors, carefully going through process after process to uncover a job they can take on.

instruction: Sawal: aik lomri ne angooron ke guchay tak pohanchne ki koshish ki lekin nakaam rahi. Mayoosi ke aalam mein lomri ne kaha ke angoor shayad waise bhi khattay thay. Yeh kahani lomri ke rawaiye ke baare mein kya zahir karti hai, aur is se kya sabaq milta hai?
output:
Jawab: lomri ne angoor ke khattay rawaiye ka muzahira kiya, jahan us ne tanqeed ki jo us ke paas nahi thi. Sabaq mayoosi ka samna karte waqt manfi rawaiye se bachne ke baare mein hai.

Ikhlaqi: jo kuch aap ke paas nahi hai usay haqeer na samjho. Aap ke paas jo kuch hai usay qabool karna aur us ki tareef karna seekhein.

instruction: Construct a poem that describes the beauty of a sunset.
output:
The setting sun paints a scene of beauty, 
A golden light casts across an azure sky. 
The orange hues of dusk mark the day's end, 
As the night brings a blanket of tranquility. 
The sun slowly fades to the horizon, 
The stars slowly take its place. 
The night slowly creeps in, 
In awe at its beauty I feel grace.

instruction: Write a four-word phrase that means the same thing as the idiom "pull a fast one".
output: Pull a sneaky stunt.

instruction: Waqt ki pabandi ke bare mein kuch bataye:
output:
Waqt ki pabandi se murad insaan ki yeh aadat hai ke woh apne kaamon ko waqt par mukammal karta hai. Hum keh saktay hain ke waqt ki pabandi aik azeem aadat hai jis ke nateeje mein yaqini tor par kamyabi hasil hoti hai.

Tamam rehnumaon mein waqt ki pabandi mushtarik hai kyun ke aadat aisi hai. Dosray alfaaz mein, jab aap waqt par hain, to aap apni zindagi mein nazm o zabt aur nazm o zabt ko barqarar rakhein ge. Is ke nateeje mein, aap ko aik muqarrar waqt ki muddat ke andar andar apne maqaasid ko tezi se hasil karne mein madad mile gi.

Is ke ilawa, yeh bhi aap ko aadat ka aik aadmi banata hai. Is se dosron ke samne bohat acha tasur paida hota hai. Waqt ki pabandi aik aisa adaab hai jo humein apne kaam ko barwaqt andaaz mein mukammal karne ki targeeb deta hai. Is se humein waqt ki ahmiyat ka ehsas bhi hota hai. Aik shakhs jo waqt ka paband hai

instruction: France mulk ke bare mein bataye:
output: Jumhooriya France ya France (Fransisi: République française, daftari naam: Jumhooriya France) aik khud mukhtar riyasat hai jis ki amal daari mein maghribi Europe ka Metropolitan France aur samandar paar waqeh mutaadid ilaqay aur amal daariyan shamil hain. France ka Metropolitan khitta Bahira-e-Room se Rudbar England aur Bahira-e-Shumal tak, naiz darya-e-Rhine se Bahr-e-Oqiyanus tak phela hua hai, jabke samandar paar ilaqon mein junubi America ka Fransisi Guyana aur Bahr-e-Kaahil wa Bahr-e-Hind mein waqeh mutaadid jazair shamil hain. Mulk ke 18 khittay (jin mein se paanch samandar paar waqeh hain) ka mukammal raqba 643,801 murabba kilometer (248,573 murabba meel) hai jis ki majmooi abadi (June 2018 ke mutabiq) 67.26 million (chay karor ikhatir lakh chiyasi hazar chay so arthis) nufoos par mushtamil hai. France aik wahdani neem sadarati jumhooriya hai jis ka darul hukumat Paris hai. Yeh France ka sab se bara shehar aur mulk ka aham tare

instruction: iPhone 15 Pro ke dauran istemaal darja hararat barhnay ki kya wajah hai
output:
iPhone 15 Pro ke chand minuteon ke istemaal se darja hararat mein izafay ki wajah samnay aa gayi. Mahireen ke mutabiq phone ke garam honay ka ehsas company ki janib se phone ko kam wazan bananay ke liye thermal system design mein samjhotay ki wajah se ho raha hai, lekin Apple ki janib se maslay ka sabab iOS 17 mein aik bug ko qarar diya gaya hai. Ghair mulki khabar rasan idaray se baat karte hue Apple ke tarjuman ka kehna tha ke sarfeen is baat ka mushahida kar saktay hain ke un ka iPhone Pro 15 is waqt garam hota hai jab woh is ko set up karte hain, backup ko restore karte hain, wireless se charge karte hain ya bhaari graphics ya processor par bhaari apps ka istemaal karte hain. Sarfeen ko jald hi operating system ki update (iOS 17.0.3) ki faraham kar di jayegi jo phone ki garmaish ke maslay ko hal karegi.

Tarjuman ke mutabiq yeh kayfiyat mamool ki baat hain, yeh amal mukammal honay ya phone ka istemaal

instruction: Nafsiyaat mein fitrat ki parwarish ki behas kya hai, aur yeh insani taraqqi ko kaise mutaasir karti hai?
output: Fitrat ki parwarish ki behas nafsiyaat mein aik markazi masla hai jo insani nashonuma aur rawaiye mein jiniyat (fitrat) aur maholiyat (parwarish) ke rishta daar shirakat ka jaiza leti hai. Yeh behas is had tak ghoomti hai ke jiniyati awaamil aur hayatiati rujhanat muqablay mein maholiyati asraat kisi fard ki shakhsiyat, zahanat aur rawaiye ke mukhtalif pehluon ko tashkeel dete hain. Scholars aam tor par is baat par muttafiq hain ke fitrat aur parwarish dono insani taraqqi mein aham kirdar ada karte hain. Jiniyat afraad ko virasat mein milne wali paish goiyon aur salahiyaton mein hissa dalte hain, mizaaj aur baaz ilmi salahiyaton jaise pehluon ko mutaasir karte hain. Doosri taraf, maholiyati awaamil, bshamool parwarish, saqafat, aur zindagi ke tajurbaat, in mwarosi khaslat

instruction: Explain what is the difference between Photosynthesis and Respiration.
output: Photosynthesis is a process by which plants use sunlight and carbon dioxide to produce energy. During the process, plants take in carbon dioxide and convert it into energy-producing carbohydrates like glucose. Respiration, on the other hand, is when living organisms use the energy produced in photosynthesis to generate energy for their own use. Unlike photosynthesis, respiration consumes oxygen as well as glucose and releases carbon dioxide.

instruction: Kya neeli aankhein haqeeqat mein neeli nahin hoti'n?
output:
Jab yeh kaha jata hai ke kisi ki aankhein aasman jaisi neeli hain to yeh sach hai kyun ke dono'n mein se kisi ka bhi rang haqeeqat mein neela nahin hota.

Faza mein kisi bhi cheez ka rang neela nahin aur na hi duniya ki abadi mein taqreeban aath feesad un logon ki aankh ka rang neela hota hai.

Haqeeqat mein yeh nazar ka dhoka hai jo kisi cheez ki kami ki wajah se paida hota hai.

Lekin is paheli ko samajhne ke liye aap ko aankh ki science se aashna hona pare ga khususan aankh ke rang ki science se.

Aankh ka iris do tahon par mushtamil hota hai jis mein samne ki taraf 'stroma' jabke is ke darpardah 'epithelium' ki teh hoti hai.

Epithelium ki motai sirf do khaliyon par muheet hoti hai jo gehre bhoore rang ke pigments par mushtamil hotay hain, neeli rang ki aankhon mein bhi.

Jab aap ko kisi ki aankh mein koi nuqta nazar aata hai to yeh darasal epithelium hota hai. Is

instruction: Kele ke fawaid kon kon se hain?
output:
Kela aik mazedar aur nisbat'an sasta phal to hai hi aur yeh sab jante bhi hain magar yeh baatein in khususiyaat ke muqablay mein bohat kam hain jo yeh apne andar kisi khazane ki manind chhupaye hue hai, aur shayad yahi wajah hai ke doctor kele ko rozmarrah khoraak mein shamil karne par zor dete hain.
Tahum is sawal ke kele khanay se insaan ko kya fawaid haasil hotay hain, ka jawab Indian TV channel NDTV ki report mein diya gaya hai.
Kele mein potassium, vitamin C, vitamin B6, fiber ki achi khaasi miqdar payi jati hai jabke is mein calories bohat kam hoti hain jabke yeh anti-oxidant bhi hotay hain.
Isi tarah yeh inhazam ke nizaam ko behtar banane ke saath saath dil ki sehat ke liye mufeed hain.
Vitamin C, vitamin B6 aur potassium balon aur jild ko sehat mand rakhne mein aham kirdar ada karte hain. Vitamin C jhuriyon se bachata hai, isi tarah vitamin B melanin zarraat ko mutaharrik karta hai jo balon aur jild ki rangat mein ah
